product_info.title: Restored Apple iPhone 11 - Fully Unlocked - 64 GB Black (Refurbished)
product_info.short_description_html: Shoot 4K videos, beautiful portraits, and sweeping landscapes with the all-new dual-camera system. Capture your best low-light photos with Night mode. See true-to-life color in your photos, videos, and games on the 6.1-inch Liquid Retina display. Experience unprecedented performance with A13 Bionic for gaming, augmented reality (AR), and photography. Do more and charge less with all-day battery life. And worry less with water resistance up to 2 meters for 30 minutes.

product_info.long_description_html:
• “Like-new” condition with very light micro-scratches, invisible at a distance of 8-12 inches (arm’s length).
  • Battery life, if applicable, must be 80% of the “like-new” equivalent or higher. At least 90-days free returns.
  • 64 GB Memory
  • Verizon GSM Unlocked
  • Black
  • Released in 2019
  • Refurbished

warnings.name: Ingestion Hazard
warnings.value: This product contains a battery. Death or serious injury can occur if ingested. A swallowed battery can cause Internal Chemical Burn in as little as 2 hours. Keep new and used batteries OUT OF REACH OF CHILDREN. Seek Immediate medical attention if a battery is suspected to be swallowed or inserted inside any part of the body.

fulfilment_info.message: Free shipping, arrives by Wed, Jan 29 to Sacramento, 95829

addon_services.service_subtitle: Get peace of mind for pennies a day!

top_negative_reviews.title: NOT REFURBISHED. CHEAP, SCRATCHED, DAMAGED. LIES
top_negative_reviews.text:
DO NOT BUY

These are not refurbished phones. It's very clear that this is simply a factory reset, used phone. It came in cheap, generic packaging and was scratched up all over the screen, the back, the sides were chipped and damaged. False advertising. I paid $224 for junk. Opened it and sent it back immediately.

top_positive_reviews.title: SO HAPPY
top_positive_reviews.text: PRISTINE condition. Seriously wondered if was really brand new. If not for the fact that it noticeably has which what was expected to be, only 79% battery capacity. Which means unfortunately this device does die VERY quickly . However it also is a very easy solution as well and none the less an AMAZING deal on this device. Never been happier .

top_reviews.title: Disappointed
top_reviews.text: I really wish the phone description accurately described the large and small scratches on the screen because I definitely wouldn’t have purchased it. Light scratches on the side is one thing, but I need a new screen and all they gave me back was $30.

I ordered 2 phone from this company the first one came in good condition no issues are no scratches. The second one came with a lot of scratches on the phone screen what was the point you send me a phone with a lot of scratches on the screen phone for.

top_reviews.title: Poor battery life, would not activate
top_reviews.text: This phone looks new, no scratches or cracks but it does overheat while charging. Battery life was at 78 and charged very slowly compared to my old iphone XR with 81% battery life. The main problem is that it would not activate with my provider meaning I was not able to make any calls or texts outside my own home.

top_reviews.title: NOT REFURBISHED. CHEAP, SCRATCHED, DAMAGED. LIES
top_reviews.text:
DO NOT BUY

These are not refurbished phones. It's very clear that this is simply a factory reset, used phone. It came in cheap, generic packaging and was scratched up all over the screen, the back, the sides were chipped and damaged. False advertising. I paid $224 for junk. Opened it and sent it back immediately.

top_reviews.title: Irresponsible service
top_reviews.text: I believe that if I ordered online from Walmart.com, it is their job to ensure that I receive my item rather than an empty package, and they did nothing to assist me. Please ensure that no other customer has to go through what I went through trying to gain help and explanation as to why I didn't receive my item that cost more than $200 and was simply an empty broken box.

top_reviews.title: Very bad purchase
top_reviews.text: the phone i brought had an old burnt out battery in it when i took it to the repair store the man told me that THANK GOD it stopped works because it could have blown up on my daughter yes it was a Christmas gift i still have the battery and it has a bad chemical smell to it

top_reviews.title: My phone didn’t work
top_reviews.text:
Ordered 12/29/23 received 1/2/24 the ordering and shipping process were great. 
However, the phone wouldn’t complete the software update and sat  for hours shown in the picture below.

I’ll be returning the device today.

top_reviews.title: Phone reset
top_reviews.text: Had to reset my son phone because he didn’t remember his password so now I can’t get into the phone because it’s locked under the first owner email what do I do

top_reviews.title: Horrible customer service.
top_reviews.text: Never got the product, it was "lost in transit" but BREED told me it wasn't. I ordered it on Monday never moved from the spot i ordered it from. They use FedEx to ship. Wouldn't recommend buying from them waste of time and money. Took me 2 days of constantly contacting Walmart and BREED to get a refund.

The product description said no scratches on screen which assumed it would be at least a new screen but the one I got had scratches all over. The quality of the rest of the phone had definite signs of wear which expected due to it being refurbished but I've bought other phones refurbished from other sellers that were far better condition. I'm just wondering why the description said if product has a screen it will not have scratches. I tried taking a picture but I couldn't light it properly to show but I assure I wouldn't go out my way to write a review and lie.

product_info.title: Straight Talk Apple iPhone 14, 128GB, Midnight - Prepaid Smartphone [Locked to Straight Talk]
product_info.short_description_html:
Take a huge leap forward with iPhone 14 from Straight Talk. With 128GB of storage for all your files, it's also full of fantastic features like the best dual-camera system on iPhone. If you thought photos and videos were stunning before, get ready to be amazed by the results you get in both low and bright light. Get way more wow with bigger, better features like a 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display1, all-day battery life and up to 20 hours of video playback2. Enjoy more peace of mind with groundbreaking safety features new to iPhone like Emergency SOS via satellite3 and Crash Detection. Cruise at high speeds with an A15 Bionic chip, 5-core GPU and superfast 5G cellular4.

Pair it with a no-contract unlimited talk, text & data plan from Straight Talk to keep you connected for less on America's most reliable 5G† Network. Find the Apple iPhone 14 and Straight Talk plans online or in-store at your local Walmart. This iPhone 14 is locked to Straight Talk and can only be used with Straight Talk service.

product_info.long_description_html:
• 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display
      • Advanced camera system for better photos in any light
      • Cinematic mode now in 4K Dolby Vision up to 30 fps
      • Action mode for smooth, steady, handheld videos
      • Industry-leading durability features with Ceramic Shield and water resistance5
      • iOS 16 offers even more ways to personalize, communicate, and share6
    • Coverage on America's most reliable 5G† network
    • Compatible with talk, text data plans from Straight Talk
      • Straight Talk utilizes the network with the most first place rankings in RootMetrics® 2H 2022 5G reliability assessments of 125 metros. Results may vary. Not an endorsement
      • †5G access requires a 5G-capable device in a 5G coverage area
      • Pair this phone with a best-selling no-contract Straight Talk plan
      • Learn more about Straight Talk by visiting our Brand Page
      • 1The display has rounded corners. When measured as a standard rectangular shape, the screen is 6.06 inches diagonally. Actual viewable area is less.
      • 2Emergency SOS via satellite is available in November 2022. Service is included for free for two years with the activation of any iPhone 14 model. Connection and response times vary based on location, site conditions, and other factors. See Apple website for more information.
      • 3Battery life varies by use and configuration; see Apple website for more information.
      • 4Data plan required. 5G is available in select markets and through select carriers. Speeds vary based on site conditions and carrier. For details on 5G support, contact your carrier and see Apple website
      • 5iPhone 14 is splash, water, and dust resistant and was tested under controlled laboratory conditions with a rating of IP68 under IEC standard 60529 (maximum depth of 6 meters up to 30 minutes). Splash, water, and dust resistance are not permanent conditions. Resistance might decrease as a result of normal wear. Do not attempt to charge a wet iPhone; refer to the user guide for cleaning and drying instructions. Liquid damage not covered under warranty.
      • 6Some features may not be available for all countries or all areas.

top_negative_reviews.title: FRAUD
top_negative_reviews.text: FRAUD. When I purchased this phone the description said unlocked can be used at any carrier. Good price.

top_reviews.title: Upgraded to Straight Talk iPhone 14
top_reviews.text: I upgraded from a Straight Talk Apple iPhone 11 to the 14. I have been using it for a week and love the upgrade. There was an issue transferring the sim, the 14 no longer uses a physical SIM card and straight talk did not support the eSIM transfer, had to spend about 20 minutes on the phone with customer service before the problem was resolved but the phone itself is sleek and the updated features are great.

top_reviews.title: Nice upgrade
top_reviews.text: It's a good upgrade i like going slow before buying anything new so from 11 iPhone to 14 model I feel comfortable and it works great

top_reviews.title: Works great
top_reviews.text: It works just fine. I needed to upgrade so my AirPods Pro works. Battery time is a great improvement over my 11 model.

top_reviews.title: Better than SE
top_reviews.text: Camera is excellent compared to my SE2. The controls are schizophrenic and unresponsive at times. I'll have to get used to the feel of it. It's too much for single handed use.
received in timely manner for christmas present. not sure if it wasnt supposed to come in a straight talk box but it sure didnt so im kind of iffy right now

top_negative_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE
top_negative_reviews.text: It was said to have “light scratches” but there were many dents along the phone and deeper ones in the corners of the phones, even the camera was scratched up. I was very unsatisfied. It is better to just purchase a brand new one rather then waste your money.

top_positive_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas present for my son as his first phone. Phone came a day early and despite a few bad reviews I’m really glad I went through with the purchase. Phone had a small scratch but isn’t even noticeable with a screen protector on it. It even came with a brand new charger. I was pretty spectacle at first but overall I’m really happy with it.

top_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas present for my son as his first phone. Phone came a day early and despite a few bad reviews I’m really glad I went through with the purchase. top_reviews.title: Nothing wrong with it

top_reviews.title: Iphone 14

top_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE

top_reviews.title: I almost got ripped off
top_reviews.text: I purchased the phone online for $435. It was supposed to be a refurbished phone. It was delivered to my post office on a Saturday. I didn’t receive it till Monday and it has 3 cracks  in the screen and the battery dies real quick. I will never buy anything for you guys again. You guys are get over scammers and I will be returning this item for a full refund.

top_reviews.title: screen was all scratched up had to return
top_reviews.text: I would be ok if the back or side were with scratches, but it says "restored/renewed" i did not expect the front to be all scratched up, not just a couple of small ones but all around the screen and big ones. Had to return and get my money back, definitely  not satisfied. The back was in good condition...

top_reviews.title: SCAM/HORRIBLE
top_reviews.text: Horrible worse experience I’ve ever had I paid almost $500 for a iPhone 14 and never received it I called Walmart customer service and was told I can’t get a refund or for them to send my order to me don’t order they gonna scam u and no one gonna do nothing about it you’re just gonna be out of $500.

top_reviews.title: poorly packaging,
top_reviews.text: very poorly packaged, arrived with a big mark, and scratched, because it only came wrapped in a plastic without vurvujas, very bad experience, I do not recommend.

top_reviews.title: To much damage.

product_info.title: Pre-Owned Apple iPhone 12 mini - Carrier Unlocked - 64 GB Blue (Good)
product_info.short_description_html:
This item is refurbished.  The Apple iPhone 12 mini packs big features in a 5.4-inch design. 5G to download movies on the fly and stream high-quality video. A beautifully bright and compact Super Retina XDR display. Ceramic Shield with 4x better drop performance. Incredible low-light photography with Night mode on all cameras. Cinema-grade Dolby Vision HDR video recording, editing, and playback. Powerful A14 Bionic chip. And new MagSafe accessories for easy attach and faster wireless charging. It’s big news for mini.

The iPhone has been professionally inspected and refurbished by certified technicians.  It is in good condition with light scratches, scuffs and minor blemishes.

top_positive_reviews.title: Great pre-owned iPhone 12 mini, great value
top_positive_reviews.text: Arrived in better condition than expected, cleaned and looked almost Like New! Arrived on time, in good packaging, and inside the box a good third-party Lighting charge cable. All functions checked well, and Battery at 84% — very acceptable. I'm a huge fan of the 12 and 13 mini form factors. I will be gifting this 12 mini to a family member soon, so it was critical this was a good refurbished purchase. After a week's use, I'm a very satisfied customer. I would certainly buy from this vendor again.

top_reviews.title: iPhone SE 2024
top_reviews.text: Phone is small and fits perfect in my shirt pocket, which is what I need for work. Although it's not the biggest iPhone out there it's performance and 5G capabilities are exactly the combo I needed. No problem multi tasking and using multiple applications simultaneously.. Great phone!

top_reviews.title: Perfect small IPhone
top_reviews.text: Perfect phone for someone that doesn't want a huge phone. The size is perfect to fit in your pocket and easy to hold on your hand. Sound quality is good, surprisingly good bass from speakers for a small phone. Screen is bright and battery last all day with moderate use. I had a IPhone 12Mini and the battery wasn't lasting all day so I switched to this to hold me over until the SE 4 comes out and I'm glad I did. Great for someone that wants a new iPhone.

top_reviews.text: Straight talk seems to be in the middle of a take over. Customer service is a joke. Can't do anything on the website. I heard that Verizon bought them, I hope so. Phone is great, actually phone service is great. Just be prepared for no frills or customer service.

top_reviews.title: Bargain Price, Big Quality
top_reviews.text: I bought this phone after loving my old 6S to death. Not quite to death, as the old phone still works fine. But, it no longer updated my apps, so I decided to upgrade. I chose the SE3 since it fits the same cases as my old 6S, and I didn't want to have to buy another Otter Box case, since they're expensive and I'd recently bought a new case. It's nice to have a battery that will last more than a day, since the old 6S was barely making it back home from work before dying.

top_reviews.title: Terrible Customer Service, Fradulent Product
top_reviews.text:
I want to preface this by saying I never ever leave reviews on anything. I usually suck up the faulty product or bad service and move on but after what I went through today, I felt I needed to say something so no one else has to deal with what I went through today. 

I bought an Iphone 14 pro with this company. I made sure to purchase one that was carrier unlocked so that I may use my own carrier on my old phone to switch it over. The phone came in prefect condition physically and was free of any scratches, dents, or dings. However when I began to set up the phone I ran into several issues. 

Firstly, I began by logging in with my apple ID and begining to update the phone. The screen was stuck on updating for hours and took so long that I had to sit on the phone with apple for 4 hours to force restart the phone and troubleshoot the issue on their end. 

After that I called my mobile provider to transfer sims over. This is when I was told that the phone was “blacklisted” by verizon and was listed as lost and still had collections payments on it from verizon. I was on the phone disputing this for another 4 hours when they told me there was nothing they could do and that the phone was defective. 

I then reached out to Walmart who reached out to Loop Mobile because Walmart also couldn’t do anything about it. This is where I was told by Loop (through email because the customer service phone number doesnt work) that I needed to repackage and return the phone to fedex. They couldn’t even be bothered to process an exchange. 

All in all I wasted my time and money with this company and I will not be going through that again. Their response time was horrible and they are not truthful about their product descriptions and will sell you something that straight up cannot be used. I’d put zero stars if I could.

top_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY NO MATTER WHAT! A WASTE OF MONEY
top_reviews.text: Despite the terrible reviews I tried to give it a chance, I didnt notice anything but a few scratches when I recieved it but as I started using it I noticed a black circle on the screen while I was on facetime, also while playing a game on my phone I noticed if I tilted the phone up a bit I could clearly see a crack, they hide it under a glass screen protector, this is a scam!!!

Yes, actually the phone came broken. Have to screen was black and when I checked the report on the phones prior damage, it said exactly what was going on with it, and if I have screen is black, and the screen was shipped, it was never refurbished and now I have to go through a whole lot to a whole lot of hoops just to get my grandmother another phone and she's in a different state. This is crazy.

top_reviews.text: Planned to purchase a refurbished IPhone 12, however for the price, I ordered a refurbished IPhone 13.  It was compatible with my cell carrier and my old SIM card worked perfect (I research first to make sure the SIM card was also compatible).   Have been using for almost 1 month, and for a refurbished phone, it works Perfect!

top_reviews.title: Good phone pay for what you get
top_reviews.text: You pay for what you get. It’s obviously refurbished but you get charger block and cable. Additionally the phone itself had a few paint scratches on the corner but no one sees that with a case. And my battery was at 94% upon receiving. Still great deal for the price.

top_reviews.title: Disappointed
top_reviews.text:
I know this is a refurbished phone, however the description said it was in excellent condition. I think this is fair condition. Seems the phone was dropped several times with no protection.
Still I do not know how is internally, but if I see any issue, I am
Pretty sure I will return it.
Seller, should be more honest of the condition of the products.

top_reviews.title: A bit disappointed and glitchy…
top_reviews.text: I have purchased refurbished phones for years here. And I will continue to do so. This is the first time I really wish I could return it and exchange it for another iPhone 13. It has so many glitches. It’s unbelievable. It glitches on 80% of my apps. It actually freezes on apps and I haven’t had that happen since my iPhone 5. I continually have to turn my phone off and on to get out of an app that has been frozen. I’m extremely disappointed that I’m stuck with a phone that works worse than the iPhone 11 that I have sitting in my drawer. I was also a little surprised that earbuds were not included, and I did purchase three phones, so I dropped quite a bit of money. But my philosophy is: It’s just a thing and no one is hurt so all is well.

top_reviews.title: Worst refurbished phone
top_reviews.text: I was excited to receive this renewed iPhone and I got this for my moms birthday but when the iPhone arrived, it was not what I expected, the camera had scratches on it and there was noticeable scratches on the side of the phone, the battery life is horrible at 85 and the speaker and charging holes were all filled with lint. the phone itself is usable but I would not recommend this if your looking to buy a good pre owned iPhone

top_reviews.title: Don't waste your money or time
top_reviews.text: Received phone and assumed it was in excellent condition like stated. After opening it up Christmas morning the phone looks like it has been dropped multiple times, the edges are scratched and rough. (When I say rough I do mean it will tear up your fingers.) The screen has multiple scratches on it and it is not in excellent condition. We will be returning this and it is disappointing to spend this much money and get a phone that looks worse than any of our used phones. Way to hurt my sons feelings for Christmas. That makes me even more angry.

top_reviews.title: Do not buy!!!!!
top_reviews.text: I opened the box to a phone with scratches all over the screen and dents on the side. I plug it in and the whole bottom half has green marks across the screen. I went to touch the screen and heard a crunch like the screen was out of place or not the original screen. They didn’t send an actual iPhone cord/ charger box. I wouldn’t recommend!

top_reviews.title: Completely disappointed
top_reviews.text: This phone is not “refurbished” it is simply a used phone with not horrible but not good condition every single edge has awful scratches the paint is taken off and the screen has scratches everywhere. I purchased this expecting the phone to be restored as described with “good” condition. Completely mislead I feel scammed out of my money

top_negative_reviews.title: Beware!
top_negative_reviews.text: The box when delivered was empty- the top was sealed but the bottom was opened and resealed with clear packaging tape over the Walmart tape (see pictures). Walmart would not honor a claim. Their position was the box (top) was sealed and they are charging me. A picture shows the content that was inside the box.

top_positive_reviews.title: such a great phone!!!
top_positive_reviews.text: no scratches or cracks, came within three days (which was on time), and came with a charger! i lost my phone recently and i bought a new one, and was skeptical since i didn't know what a “used b grade phone” would be like. im so happy I bought this phone since is came in amazing condition and if i had to buy a phone again I'd buy this one! :D <3

top_reviews.title: such a great phone!!!

top_reviews.title: Perfect phone
top_reviews.text: Perfect phone! When the phone arrived, we expected it and only saw one small scratch and literally had to move it around in the light to see it.  The phone works great with no issues!  Great price!!  Now that I know how great the phone is and such a good deal, I will be going this route again in the future!!

top_reviews.title: Short battery life
top_reviews.text:
I got what I paid for. The battery life was 73%. Im on my phone too much for that. The charger quit working the first day, luckily I have several.
Shipped fast, packaged well. The seller wasn't deceptive. The phone works well, the battery just doesn't have the battery life I need and swapping it puts the price at or above a new phone.

top_reviews.title: Beware!
top_reviews.text: The box when delivered was empty- the top was sealed but the bottom was opened and resealed with clear packaging tape over the Walmart tape (see pictures). Walmart would not honor a claim. Their position was the box (top) was sealed and they are charging me. A picture shows the content that was inside the box.

top_reviews.title: Very upset with experience.
top_reviews.text: Returned the phone because i found a better option for my daughter. Going on almost three weeks and I still have not received the money back even though they marked that they received the phone and sent the money. Wal mart says it must have been lost. Unsure how you lose a refund but ok… Now I have to wait another week for the money to be found.

top_reviews.title: They sent us a defective phone
top_reviews.text: We just got the phone and the first time my daughter tries to get a phone call or record. It's nothing but static they sent us a defective damaged phone. We will be returning it.

top_reviews.title: False advertising - Don't buy pre-owned or renewed
top_reviews.text:
The phone worked great for 6 weeks. Then Died. According to the walmart website, the seller (Breed) has a 4 week return policy, and 1  year warranty via "Loop mobile." email the seller about the phone. They say it it out of warrantee. They return my email with it  is "past the 30 day warrantee." Sent them a screenshot of the walmart website where it states it has a 30 day return policy, but a 12 month warrantee with a screenshot.
   emailed me back....

Hello, 
That warranty is by "Loop Mobile" as mentioned in the description. We are Breed products, our warranty is 30 days for a refund. 
Best regards, 
Customer Service
............How would I know the warrantee is for some mobile company that does not exist and not valid for the product I am buying from the website? This is blatant false advertising. Don't buy anything pre-owned or renewed from walmart. they are doing business with crooks.

top_reviews.title: Incorrect item sent and no word from the seller.
top_reviews.text:
I ordered the iPhone 11 128 GB in yellow, but instead received an iPhone 11 64 GB in white. The battery had also been replaced by a non-apple product and so the phone cannot verify the battery's health. 
I am very disappointed and dissatisfied with the product, the lack of customer care and the money spent on something I did not order, now inconveniencing me further to find the correct item but also wait for a refund so I can find what I should have received initially. 
Customer care and seller were both reached out to, but still waiting. I'll be returning the product and receiving full refund to spend my money elsewhere

top_reviews.title: Beware do not buy
top_reviews.text: Just wow.  Phone says battery not found. So no charging and you can if you are lucky use the phone while it's n the charger. I have started a return and dropped the item off at Walmart as instructed. 5 days later still saying I need to drop off my return. I am getting absolutely no where with neither Walmart nor the seller. So much for this being a Christmas present because if I get a refund at all it's going to take forever to get anywhere on this. Phone also comes with nothing

top_reviews.title: iPhone 11 Pre-owned
top_reviews.text: The Pre-Owned Apple iPhone 11 didn't work. I gave it to my young brother for his 15th birthday, But shortly it didn't last a week. I ended up taking bringing it to see if it can get fixed at a Phone-Repair place and they ended up saying the charging port and the battery didn't work. Till this day I don't what might have caused that problem, but yeah.

top_reviews.title: Great!
top_reviews.text: I am very pleased. It is in way better condition than what I imagined. It also came with a screen protector and a phone case which they did not have to send with the phone! The only thing that was supposed to come with it is a charger. 100% recommend!

The phone kept freezing would have to reset it every other hour battery would drain so fast always had to stay on the charger finally had got me a new 16 for Christmas I order this iPhone XR in began of October
When my phone arrived it was smashed and shattered from the supplier. It looked like it was stepped on from the business and ship it cause the envelope wasn't damaged. The charger was broken also

top_reviews.title: Terrible condition
top_reviews.text: Very dissatisfied! The phone came completely dead, tons of scratches, and a damaged camera. Now I'm fully aware I purchased a refurbished phone, but the condition of this phone is terrible. Not to mention they're selling it as grade A - which should be 'like new' especially considering the price I paid. This is a C product AT BEST and not worth half the price I paid! Definitely returning it!

The phone was not worth over 300 it works and all but some people were saying they got free phone cases, mine did not and had a lot of scratches on the screen of your going to charge over 300 for a refurbished phone at least make sure the screen is brand new or is like brand new. Another thing the phone came to me dead like dead dead and that’s not cool. Everyone knows it’s bad for a device to completely let the battery drain.

product_info.title: Pre-Owned Apple iPhone SE 2020 2nd Gen. 64GB Factory Unlocked Smartphone (Good)
product_info.short_description_html:
We put the brains of iPhone 11 Pro in the body of iPhone SE. A13 Bionic is the fastest chip ever in a smartphone, period. So everything feels fluid, whether you’re launching apps, playing the latest games, or exploring new ways to work and play with augmented reality. The advanced camera system with A13 Bionic brings you Portrait mode, which artfully blurs the background to put the focus on your subject — even when you’re taking selfies. Depth Control. A simple slider lets you blur the background as much or as little as you like — before or after you take the photo. Portrait Lighting. Choose from six studio‑quality effects, then adjust the lighting intensity to show your subject in the best possible light. Next‑generation Smart HDR knows a face when it sees one, and intelligently relights it to capture more natural-looking contours and skin tones. It also finesses highlight and shadow detail in the background. So every part of your photo looks amazing. 4K video means you’ll see four times more detail than in 1080p HD video. And extended dynamic range adds greater detail in highlights and shadows. Touch ID lets you securely unlock your iPhone and sign in
to apps instantly. You can even use it with Apple Pay to grab a coffee, get a yoga app, or shop for sneakers online.
All without reaching for your credit card. Everything we make is designed to give you control over your information. All the iMessages you send are encrypted. Fingerprint data is stored on your device, never on Apple servers or in iCloud. Apple Pay doesn’t share your credit card number. And the list goes on. iPhone SE is water resistant to 1 meter for 30 minutes. It’s not afraid of a little coffee, tea, or soda either. And dust? No worries. The show must go on. So iPhone SE lets you watch up to 13 hours of video on a single charge.3 When you do need to power up, just set it down on a wireless charger. Or connect to an 18W fast-charge adapter to go from zero to up to 50 percent in 30 minutes. iPhone SE is made to run the latest features — and even some that haven’t been invented yet. So you can use Dark Mode, Siri Shortcuts, and the new Photos app now. And take advantage of feature and security updates in the future.

It is a good condition. There are some scratches on the screen, but hard to notice.  The battery is a bit short lived. Overall it is very good for the price.
the phone turns off every 5 minutes and the battery was at 80% a scam and it took a while to arrive I would like to return the phone. It turns off and on every 4 minutes

top_reviews.title: Falsely advertised as unlocked!
top_reviews.text: Do not buy an iPhone from this retailer if you're expecting it to be unlocked. The phone overall looked like it was in good condition though, but it came with a SIM card that was for Ting Mobile and I wanted to keep my Straight Talk service. I just tried transferring my SIM card from current iPhone to this new phone just to see if it would work anyways, and it did not work at all. Very disappointed!

top_reviews.title: DON'T DO IT
top_reviews.text:
NOT WORTH IT 
SAME DAY I GOT THE PHONE WAS THE SAME DAY I RETURNED IT 
Turned off randomly multiple times
Service was in and out, wouldn't connect to the internet .
it was just more stress than not having a phone
truly not even worth it will not be buying refurbished items from this seller

top_reviews.title: Perfect condition
top_reviews.text:
Just as stated came quickly with
Charger. We brought a SIM card and it worked like a charm. No complaints as of
Yet
Love this little back up phone. Handy to have with you. Love the size . Battery doesn't last as long as my other Apple phone but I am not complaining.
Very pleased with product. Phone was practically brand new very well kept to be refurbished. Also the price was phenomenal. I have another one in my card to purchase . Also it arrived in good time.

product_info.title: Pre-Owned Apple iPhone 11 Pro- Carrier Unlocked -256 GB Green (Good)
product_info.short_description_html:
This item is in good condition, showing signs of use from normal wear. It is backed by a 90 day warranty. It is fully functional and has been professionally refurbished, inspected and cleaned to good condition. This product has been determined fully functional by our industry leading 30+ point functionality inspection. UL approved power adapter and charging cable are included. This product will not come in its original packaging; Headphones, SIM card and manual will not be included.

Shoot 4K videos, beautiful portraits, and sweeping landscapes with the all-new triple-camera system. Capture your best low-light photos with Night mode. See true-to-life color in your photos, videos, and games on the 5.8-inch Liquid Retina display. Experience unprecedented performance with A13 Bionic for gaming, augmented reality (AR), and photography. Do more and charge less with long-lasting battery life.

warnings.name: Ingestion Hazard
warnings.value: This product contains a battery. Death or serious injury can occur if ingested. A swallowed battery can cause Internal Chemical Burn in as little as 2 hours. Keep new and used batteries OUT OF REACH OF CHILDREN. Seek Immediate medical attention if a battery is suspected to be swallowed or inserted inside any part of the body.

fulfilment_info.message: Free shipping, arrives by Tue, Jan 28 to Sacramento, 95829

top_negative_reviews.text: I am very upset about my experience with this iPhone from Kiss Inc. I purchased the phone as a Christmas gift for my teenager, and it was not opened until Christmas day. I returned it to the Walmart store on December 26th, the day after Christmas. As of today, December 30th, I still have not received my refund.

top_positive_reviews.text: This phone truly csne like it was brand new.flawless in looks and beautifully in functionality.it works like a dream.with fast customer service response to a question I had. if you're worried about purchasing a refurbished phone go with this company it'll be worth it. I'm very pleased.

top_reviews.text: This phone truly csne like it was brand new.flawless in looks and beautifully in functionality.it works like a dream.with fast customer service response to a question I had. if you're worried about purchasing a refurbished phone go with this company it'll be worth it. I'm very pleased.

top_reviews.title: Love it.
top_reviews.text: I just received my iPhone 11 Pro yesterday and I love it. I was little worried about scratches on the phone since it was refurbished but it looks brand new. I took it to work set it up changed my sim card from my iPhone 7 and everything went smoothly. I also love the green color.  It is a little bigger than my old phone.  This is an early birthday present to myself and definitely worth what I paid for it. This time I got 258gb. This is such a great purchase if you are on the fence about buying it i say just buy it.

top_reviews.title: Great phone
top_reviews.text: I ordered this phone and it came a day early. This phone is not a B graded condition phone. This phone is a A graded condition phone. It has 1 miner scratch that you can barely see. Everything works so far. I've had this phone for 1 day, and I love it. The phone is a little smaller then I expected but nice. It came with Screen protection already on it.

top_reviews.title: I got exactly as described.
top_reviews.text: It is exactly as described, got my iPhone on time. It did have 2 deep scratches on the screen, and a lot of little scratches too, but it was expected to have scratches, it is in the description. Got the case to cover it. It had 85% of battery, the buttons and cameras work well, the touch screen works fine. It is a working iPhone.

top_reviews.title: Awesome review for this seller
top_reviews.text: Loved my new phone. Phone came in almost perfect condition! Very very minimal scratches by you can hardly tell. Phone came in the condition as it was stated on the website. Very satisfied with my purchase!

top_reviews.title: More like D condition.
top_reviews.text: Has functioned so far. But it did come with a nick on the screen which i fear my turn into a crack, black spots all over the back under the surface (not sure how they possibly got there or if the company replaced the entire back), and the battery was at 79% considered "needs service" by Apple. This will cost you an extra $69 to fix before taxes from Apple and more ironically at 3rd parties They don't do exchanges, which means you'll be in limbo for awhile until they confirm receipt of the phone and Wal mart refunds your money. I needed the phone so I kept it, but I would definitely advise to buy from another seller or location. Hope this helps someone.

I am very upset about my experience with this iPhone from Kiss Inc. I purchased the phone as a Christmas gift for my teenager, and it was not opened until Christmas day. I returned it to the Walmart store on December 26th, the day after Christmas. As of today, December 30th, I still have not received my refund.

top_reviews.title: Do not recommend.
top_reviews.text: Battery is failing on me in which it should not be, I've had this phone for 2 months and my battery capacity hit 0%. The phones turns off and on by itself. I asked for a replacement but synergy talked about a refund, I don't exactly know how to return something I'm making payments on.

top_reviews.title: Unhappy Customer
top_reviews.text: I purchased a phone from this company, it worked for 1 day and it won't charge or nothing… I contacted the company for this ti issue me some type of credit so I can get the phone fixed and No one responded… Totally disappointed
Been using this phone for a week, screen continues to freeze, the calibration is off and you can't not listen to earphones with this device as it turns the volume completely down.

product_info.title: Walmart Family Mobile Apple iPhone SE3 5G, 64GB, Midnight - Prepaid Smartphone [Locked to Walmart Family Mobile]
product_info.short_description_html: Serious power meets serious value with the iPhone SE in Midnight from Walmart Family Mobile. A lightning-fast A15 Bionic chip and fast 5G1 connectivity make this the most powerful 4.7-inch2 iPhone ever. Enjoy up to 15 hours3 of video playback on a Retina HD display made from the toughest glass available in a smartphone. Go big with stellar battery life and a superstar camera system featuring a 12MP Wide camera, Smart HDR 4, Photographic Styles, Portrait mode, and 4K video up to 60 fps. Share the moment with friends and family in stunning detail on the 7MP FaceTime HD camera with 1080p video recording. This iPhone is built for life-on-the-go with a durable, IP67 water resistant4 design and a Home button with secure Touch ID. You’ll love the power and the possibilities of iOS 15, which packs new features to do more with iPhone than ever before5. Pair it with an unlimited talk, text & data plan  from Walmart Family Mobile to save money with no contract on a nationwide 5G network†. Find the Apple iPhone SE in Midnight and Walmart Family Mobile plans online or in-store at your local Walmart.

top_reviews.title: Nightmare of an experience ...
top_reviews.text: I got this phone as a birthday gift and only wanted to upgrade my phone from the previous edition of the iPhone SE. What a headache it was! This phone was packaged incorrectly as it was not with Walmart Family Mobile (SFM) as advertised. It also had a SIM card sticker label that didn't correctly match up with the SIM card itself. With all of that, it created over 16 hours worth of work on my part including hours worth of time on the phone with Tech Support to (1) transfer back to my preferred carrier of WFM and (2) to retrieve my cell phone number that I've had for decades which is essentially tied to all my work and personal apps, etc. I was giving the "run around" and "circular talk" with some reps stating they couldn't get my phone number paired back with my old phone which was obviously false as eventually a few reps worked hard to make this happen for me. Along with the time spent trying to recover my old phone and old number, I got behind with my business/work. Please make sure to be aware of what you're getting before you try the transfer process yourself with this type of phone. After more tech support with Walmart.com, I was able to eventually return the phone for a full refund. This process was truly a nightmare to deal with. I can only hope to save others the hassle and stress and encourage Walmart.com to do a better check to ensure the phones are correctly packaged as advertised with the correct phone carriers and that the labels for SIM cards match up.

top_negative_reviews.title: Paid for an iPhone, got a piece of junk instead
top_negative_reviews.text:
Bought this phone as a birthday present for my girlfriend. Phone arrived and was surprisingly nice for being refurbished. Some small nicks and scratches were in the phone along with a pea-size dent in the screen, but it appeared to work. Start the phone and after set up, I am immediately warned that the phone has been repaired with non-Apple parts and the phone may not function properly due to this. Here we are, two day later, and the phone is black screened. It's on as we are able to feel vibrations from the phone but the screen is gone (and yes, I did the volume up, down, and Lock Screen button, still nothing). This is after buying a cover, screen protector, etc and paying to activate this useless piece of junk. 

I've bought refurbished products many times and have never had an issue such as this. $750 for a paper weight. I've already started the return process for this scam and cannot wait to do my business elsewhere.

product_info.title: Apple iPhone 12 Pro 128GB GSM/CDMA Fully Unlocked - Graphite (Used)
product_info.short_description_html:
5G speed, A14 Bionic, the fastest chip in a smartphone. An edge-to-edge OLED display. Ceramic Shield with four times better drop performance. And Night mode on every camera. iPhone 12 has it all. 5G on iPhone is superfast. So you can download movies on the fly. Stream higher-quality video. Or FaceTime in HD over cellular. With lots less lag. And you can do it in more places, because iPhone 12 has the broadest 5G coverage worldwide. A14 Bionic is the fastest chip in a smartphone. And it pushes what’s possible. Like crunching trillions of operations on the Neural Engine. Or shooting in Dolby Vision — even pro movie cameras can’t do that. It’s superefficient for great battery life. And it’s ahead of its time, prepared to power pretty much anything that comes next. Vastly more contrast. Incredible color accuracy. A huge jump in pixel density. OLED delivers brighter brights, darker blacks, and higher resolution for everything you look at. This is the best iPhone display we’ve ever made, and it goes all the way to the edge. Both the Wide and Ultra Wide cameras now have Night mode — and it’s better than ever at capturing incredible low-light shots. The new Wide camera brings in 27 percent more light. So whether you take photos by day or by moonlight, you’ll get a level of detail and color that wasn’t possible before. Night mode senses when light is low and kicks in automatically, maintaining clarity while capturing beautiful vibrant color. All you have to do is start snapping. Deep Fusion, in mid to low light, analyzes multiple exposures to maximize detail. Check out the texture in the wood, fabric, and crystal. And the Ultra Wide gets you a heroic perspective. Smart HDR 3 balances the elements in a shot, bringing out detail in the subject and trees while retaining the rich color of the sky — even at high noon. Beyond faces, Smart HDR 3 uses machine learning to recognize scenes, then adjusts sharpness, color, and white balance where needed. Even in bright light, Smart HDR 3 is amazing at capturing texture, skin tone, color saturation, and individual details that make photos feel true to life. Portrait mode is even better at artfully blurring the background to put all the focus on your subject. How do you improve on the highest-quality video in a smartphone? Make it even better in low light — a full 27 percent better. That means no hour is off limits for more beautifully detailed video. Then there’s Night mode Time-lapse. Just prop up your iPhone and let the light trails begin. Now you can record 4K HDR video with Dolby Vision. Edit in Photos or iMovie. Then zap it to your TV using AirPlay to see all that color and detail. It’s a start-to-finish cinematic experience — found only on iPhone. Which comes in handy when your dog does something adorable. Snap on a new MagSafe case, wallet, or both. (Fear not, the wallet is shielded so it’s safe for credit cards.) Magnets align themselves perfectly every time for faster wireless charging. iOS 14 is packed with shortcuts that get you just what you want, right when you want it. iPhone is designed to protect your information. Face ID data doesn’t leave your iPhone and is never backed up to iCloud or anywhere else. iOS shows you an app’s privacy practices before you download it. When you use Apple Pay, your card number isn’t shared with merchants. And the list goes on.
To charge your new iPhone, you can continue to use your USB‑A to Lightning cable. Or you can take advantage of fast charging with the USB‑C to Lightning cable now included in the box, which works with existing USB‑C power adapters and computer ports.

product_info.title: Pre-Owned Apple iPhone 13 Mini - 128GB - Unlocked - Pink
product_info.short_description_html: iPhone 13 Mini. So mini, so amazing. The iPhone 13 Mini on Straight Talk is an all-out standout featuring the most advanced dual-camera system ever on iPhone and lightning-fast performance with the all-new A15 bionic chip. Shoot incredible low-light photos and videos with the new 12MP Wide & Ultra Wide cameras and make movie magic with Cinematic mode. With 128GB of storage space, you’ll be able to download and store your favorite apps, games, music and more! Plus, the compact 5.4-inch Super Retina screen boasts an XDR display that’s even brighter, so it’s easier to see in full sunlight. ² Add in durability, power and speed with Ceramic Shield, a leap in battery life with up to 17 hours of video playback,³ and 5G capability for superfast downloads and high-quality streaming¹. Pair it with an unlimited talk, text & data plan on America’s largest and most dependable nationwide 5G networks† without a contract from Straight Talk to keep you connected for less. Find the Apple iPhone 13 mini and Straight Talk plans online or in-store at your local Walmart.

top_positive_reviews.title: Honest recently bought review
top_positive_reviews.text: I bought a pre-owned iPhone 13 during a Black Friday deal, and while the price was great, I have some concerns. The phone was quite warm during the first use, which worried me, though it may just be due to setup. Also, I couldn't access the warranty, which is unsettling for a pre-owned device. On the plus side, the phone is in excellent condition and works well, but I'd recommend ensuring the warranty is transferable before purchasing.

product_info.title: Restored Apple iPhone 12 Pro Max - Fully Unlocked - 128 GB Pacific Blue (Refurbished)
product_info.short_description_html: This refurbished Apple iPhone 12 Pro Max is one of the best iPhones ever made, and has been expertly Refurbished by our team to perform flawlessly for years to come. If you appreciate a great piece of technology, but do not like the price tag, this Apple iPhone 12 Pro Max, 128 GB, Pacific Blue - Fully Unlocked is your best choice. This Refurbished Apple phone looks great and could pass for flawless at first glance. Any cosmetic defects of this refurbished phone will be visible only under close scrutinizing, or by rotating the phone under a bright light. The phone screen could have some small or light scratches but those will not be deep enough for your fingernail to get stuck. The housing, corners, charging port, and the sim card tray will barely show slight signs of use, but again, nothing major or able to be seen from afar. In short: This Refurbished cellphone is a fully functional device. This Apple iPhone 12 Pro Max, 128 GB, Pacific Blue - Fully Unlocked will work with any US cell phone service carrier (CDMA and GSM: Verizon, T-Mobile, AT&T, Sprint, Metro PCS, Cricket, Mint, Boost Mobile, Xfinity Mobile).

top_negative_reviews.title: Ok phone. Not like New as described
top_negative_reviews.text: Got my phone it looks great. Perfect shape but sometimes it doesn't ring and at times when I'm trying to charge, it pops up that the port is wet and may take a while to dry. When I ordered the phone I ordered a case and didn't use the phone until the case arrived so I know I've not gotten it wet.

top_positive_reviews.text:
Overall, the phone was amazing few blemishes, but nothing I couldn't handle. The only issue I have with the phone is I can barely hear out of it no matter how much it's turned up no matter how many times I've tried to clean it. You can barely hear someone on the phone..it's better to turn the speaker on and have a conversation in front of people. than it is to try to hear someone through the actual ear placement location.

Other than.. great deal, fast shipping, I'll update later, as if the 2month mark, it does very well!

top_reviews.title: Just get it!
top_reviews.text: Honestly if your debating on buying a refurbished phone just do it. I was hesitant at first but just went for it and this phone basically looks brand new! Everything works fine battery life is at 88% but what do you expect it’s used, this phone is definitely a much buy! Also comes with a tempered screen glass protector already put on for you! 10/10 blew my mind how nice and well kept this phone is. Definitely worth the price! Don’t buy new by used!

top_reviews.title: Perfect!!
top_reviews.text: Great phone! I got this to quickly replace my bent iPhone 14 Pro Max. No obvious cracks or dents on this new iPhone 12 Pro Max. Very few and faint scratches on the frame but not the screen. Took 5 minutes to set up and transfer data from my broken iPhone 14 Pro Max. It is eSIM comparable so I don't have a SIM card in the card holder but it was able to make this new iPhone 12 Pro Max my primary and allow full cellular usage. All data from my iCloud transferred smoothly! Functions as new! Highly recommend!

top_reviews.title: Best phone option for starters and cheap
top_reviews.text: It's amazing came all good battery good everything is perfect on this phone at first I was scared because of the reviews but my phone came in perfect shape!!!!

Overall, the phone was amazing few blemishes, but nothing I couldn't handle. The only issue I have with the phone is I can barely hear out of it no matter how much it's turned up no matter how many times I've tried to clean it. You can barely hear someone on the phone..it's better to turn the speaker on and have a conversation in front of people. than it is to try to hear someone through the actual ear placement location.

Other than.. great deal, fast shipping, I'll update later, as if the 2month mark, it does very well!

top_reviews.title: It is what it is
top_reviews.text: This is the first refurbished phone I have bought that has scratches on it, it was dirty.. it glitches a lot the battery life is okay ..the speakers work great just the glitches are annoying ..it’s whatever.. I’ll be giving it to my son as soon as I’m close to paying it off with affirm. I’ll be buying the iPhone 14 soon..

top_reviews.title: Refurbished iPhone purchase.
top_reviews.text: Seller sent it with a battery life of only 74%.  A refurbished phone should have a battery life of 80%.  I was going to return it but after reading some reviews, people who have returned items have never received their refund..  I can't afford to just throw away $400!

top_reviews.title: Ok phone. Not like New as described
top_reviews.text: Got my phone it looks great. Perfect shape but sometimes it doesn't ring and at times when I'm trying to charge, it pops up that the port is wet and may take a while to dry. When I ordered the phone I ordered a case and didn't use the phone until the case arrived so I know I've not gotten it wet.

top_reviews.title: Not happy.
top_reviews.text: So these reviews were off and on with good and bad reviews. So I figured I would take a chance. While opening the box I noticed a scratch in the right hand corner, luckily is wasn’t as noticeable and didn’t affect the screen or anything but still there. There were chips in the side of the phone and the back cameras nothing too crazy to the point where I wouldn’t keep it because looks wise it’s good enough. The key thing that I’m sending it back for is the speakers are literally blown. My right side speaker works but it’s muffled sounds like 10 years of dirt is inside of it. The left side doesn’t even work at all. I understand it’s used but like why would you give away a phone that has a blown speaker. Isn’t that your job to fix it to sell. I’m very disappointed with this purchase, transferred all of my information too it put a screen protector on it case and everything only to take it right back off and look elsewhere. Not a reliable source to buy products from. Again, understanding they are refurbished is like a chip here a scratch here not a broke piece of equipment on the phone. Save your money. Now I have to go through a whole process with sending it back and waiting for a refund. Also, I previously owned an iPhone 11 and wanted a new phone for a better speaker and my iPhone 11 was louder than what I got. I hope this can help someone else out there to not take the gamble on kiss electronics.

top_reviews.title: Poor quality
top_reviews.text: Doesn't charge properly, has many marks dents and chunks missing on edges with some major use markings, the screen is scratched really badly all over the front face of it. The dings and scratches are one thing but for it to not stay charging is extremely inconvenient and irritating.

top_reviews.title: NOT WHAT I ORDERED..DO NOT PURCHASE
top_reviews.text: The phone that was sent to me wasn't even in an Iphone box! It came in an Android box labeled “Smart Device.” The phone is supposed to be “carrier unlocked” but it won't work with ANY carrier i've tried. It only works with the sim card that was sent with the phone called “Ting” This is a complete scam and I'm so upset. Let alone, it came with an ANDROID charger!!

product_info.short_description_html: Welcome to the new era of iPhone. With the iPhone 12 in Black from Straight Talk, you can use the ultrafast 5G to download huge files on the go and stream HDR video anytime anywhere.1 Take it all in with the beautifully bright 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display2 that's protected with Ceramic Shield with 4x better drop performance.3 Take stunning photos, even at night with incredible low-light photography with a new advanced dual-camera system. However, it was not major; and I was very busy with Christmas. Now it will not pick up the internet hardly AT ALL unless I am home! 
I finally found time to do a return….less than one month after I had bought it….and saw they had only given me two weeks from the time of purchase for a return. 
The worst iPhone I have ever owned!

top_negative_reviews.text: The phone exterior condition was flawless a major plus, however I purchased and received the unit less than 30 days ago and sadly I had to take it in to the Apple Store and spend $97.46 to have the battery replaced as it would go from fully charged to 0% in about 60 minutes with only having a 20min phone call and sending 15 text messages. If i used it to surf the web it would last less than 30min. I wasnt roaming, and I was in a good 5g coverage area. The phone had a battery health percentage of 64% right out of the box. I am going to be in contact with Walmart and the 3rd party supplier of the phone as I feel that a device being sold with a bad battery warrents a refund of what I had to spend to have the battery replaced. I purchased this device as a gift so I couldnt send it back to Walmart and await there processing time and replacement. I seriously hope that Walmart does right by this situation as they should. Be cautious when purchasing as they obviously dont throughly check what they are selling you.

top_reviews.title: iPhone 12
top_reviews.text: I ordered a refurbished “like new” iPhone 12 for my grandmother. The overall functionality is fine however there were quite a few cosmetic imperfections that I was not satisfied with. The main issue being deep scratches on the screen and around the camera. I installed a glass screen protector along with a case to stop further damage to the iPhone 12. So far it doesn't seem to be an issue but only time will tell.

top_reviews.title: iPhone 12
top_reviews.text: The screen is in good shape and phone works fine so far. Totally unlocked as it advertised. Easy to set up service. Not overly happy about the condition of the edges as it was also advertised as “like new” and I realize how far our screens and cameras have come since the 12. But overall, good experience.

i understand its refurbished, but the phone's touch screen picks and chooses when it wants to work. also, my biggest gripe is the main speaker came busted, so when listening to music, watching videos, or on a phone call the sound is just god awful.

top_negative_reviews.title: Not a good purchasing experience this time!
top_negative_reviews.text: Phone arrived in ‘decent' condition. There were several pretty decent sized dings around the outside rim of the phone (especially the corners) and around both cameras lenses. The screen was super dirty and there was ‘gunk' caked around the switch that turns the ringer on and off (listing says it was “thoroughly cleaned”, but it wasn't). Worst part, though, is the charging port either didn't work or it was also caked with ‘gunk', not allowing the phone to charge unless you physically held the charger tightly into the phone. If you let go it would stop charging after a min or 2 and you'd have to firmly press it in again. This was a really good deal, but not at all in what was described as “refurbished” condition and definitely not 100% functional as described either. Im in the process of returning it, and will also need to return the screen protectors I purchased for it once they arrive as well (the delivery date has been delayed twice). Most of my Walmart purchasing experiences have been great; unfortunately, not this one!

top_positive_reviews.title: Near new refurbishment
top_positive_reviews.text: The phone was as close to perfect. If the refurbishment had replaced the screen due to a small scratch this would have been a 5-star review. The battery was 100% . That really offset the scratch on the screen. The phone was delivered fast and was up and running in minutes. This was a big leap from my old iPhone 6. The size of the mini was perfect and the ios supreme. I'm not sure what all the crying about the 13 Mini battery life is about. My first few days on the phone had heavy use over a 14-hour day and the battery was still at 30 percent come evening. This is a keeper.

top_reviews.title: Very Frustrasted - I need this fixed
top_reviews.text:
After two days, the phone stopped workin- alternating between a black screen and an apple logo screen.  It won't turn on or off.  Then it shows a “connect to a computer, go to apple support and restore”.  iTunes won't recognize it so I can't do anything.  
Upon closer inspection, I don't think the screen is a real apple screen - there is chrome around the speaker and the screen is not completely flat.   There are distortions in the reflection, I've never seen an iPhone screen like that. 
I need a phone for work.  This is unacceptable.

top_reviews.title: I need to return this iPhone 13
top_reviews.text: The iPhone 13 that I bought refurbish basically looks like it never got refurbished because I used it for two days and now it won't charge it'll stay at one percent and die if I unplug it don't understand why but I just won't buy any refurbished phones anymore. it's not worth the hassle.

top_reviews.title: wrong condition with damage
top_reviews.text:
its really bad that i spent $311 on this phone...
Beware when you are buying and read review for explanation... 
1) I have contacted reebelo about the accessories and phone condition which they said is "good". (screenshot attached)

2) But i got a "fair" condition phone (Screenshot attached)

3) On top the power button is really stuck into the frame and i am unable to press it even... its hard to press it... they didn't even inspected it.. so it is not 100% funtional...

4) The phone camera lenses are for sure replaced which will sure have a impact on inage quality..


Overall i sucessfully wasted my money..

top_reviews.title: "A terrible experience."
top_reviews.text: "I purchased a green one, but they sent me a blue one. At the time of purchase, it didn't indicate that it was a mini, and I only realized it was a mini after receiving it."

top_reviews.title: NEVER WORKED--AVOID THIS SELLER
top_reviews.text: phone never worked.  Tried setting up with mint mobile--first, they thought the phone was still locked.  Had to wait for physical sim then went through  series of esim cards and then had to buy a physical sim from the store.  Every time mint swore they could fix it.  Finally MINT gave up and refunded me the money.  Brought it to apple and they said the phone has a damaged anennae which is why it never worked.  Customer service asked if it ever worked and i said NO and i want it to go back to you.  They then sent me an email saynig no even though i was within the 90 day timeframe.

top_reviews.title: Poor quailty phone sold for like new price.
top_reviews.text: Sold as "like new" the description for like new is "micro scratches not noticeable from 8-12 inches away." You can see the damage on the frame of this phone from 20 ft away. Be aware they are trying to sell you a poor quality phone for like new price hoping you are so desperate for the phone you jist wont return it. And if you do return it it will take them 3 weeks to give you the refund. Makes me wonder how people sleep at night taking advantage of people.

top_reviews.title: Deceptive Advertising. Phone was not "Like-New"!
top_reviews.text: If you are looking for a totally Refurbished Like new phone, I would look else where. I purchased an iPhone 13 mini that was advertised as "Like New", but was anything but. The glass had tones of scratches on both sides, one of which looked like an actual crack. the metal frame was chipped in multiple places, looking like the phone head been dropped many times. When I reached out to the seller their excuse was that the item ws mis-labeled was " Like-New" by Walmart and was not their fault. If you want to go through the hassle of ordering, receiving, then ultimately shipping back waiting for weeks for aa refund, by ll means order from this company. But if not I would look else where.

top_reviews.text: Phone arrived in ‘decent' condition. There were several pretty decent sized dings around the outside rim of the phone (especially the corners) and around both cameras lenses. The screen was super dirty and there was ‘gunk' caked around the switch that turns the ringer on and off (listing says it was “thoroughly cleaned”, but it wasn't). Worst part, though, is the charging port either didn't work or it was also caked with ‘gunk', not allowing the phone to charge unless you physically held the charger tightly into the phone. If you let go it would stop charging after a min or 2 and you'd have to firmly press it in again. This was a really good deal, but not at all in what was described as “refurbished” condition and definitely not 100% functional as described either. Im in the process of returning it, and will also need to return the screen protectors I purchased for it once they arrive as well (the delivery date has been delayed twice). Most of my Walmart purchasing experiences have been great; unfortunately, not this one!

top_reviews.title: Very Frustrasted - I need this fixed
top_reviews.text:
After two days, the phone stopped workin- alternating between a black screen and an apple logo screen.  It won't turn on or off.  Then it shows a “connect to a computer, go to apple support and restore”.  iTunes won't recognize it so I can't do anything.  
Upon closer inspection, I don't think the screen is a real apple screen - there is chrome around the speaker and the screen is not completely flat.   There are distortions in the reflection, I've never seen an iPhone screen like that. 
I need a phone for work.  This is unacceptable.

top_reviews.title: I need to return this iPhone 13
top_reviews.text: The iPhone 13 that I bought refurbish basically looks like it never got refurbished because I used it for two days and now it won't charge it'll stay at one percent and die if I unplug it don't understand why but I just won't buy any refurbished phones anymore. it's not worth the hassle.

top_reviews.title: wrong condition with damage
top_reviews.text:
its really bad that i spent $311 on this phone...
Beware when you are buying and read review for explanation... 
1) I have contacted reebelo about the accessories and phone condition which they said is "good". (screenshot attached)

2) But i got a "fair" condition phone (Screenshot attached)

3) On top the power button is really stuck into the frame and i am unable to press it even... its hard to press it... they didn't even inspected it.. so it is not 100% funtional...

4) The phone camera lenses are for sure replaced which will sure have a impact on inage quality..


Overall i sucessfully wasted my money..

top_reviews.title: "A terrible experience."
top_reviews.text: "I purchased a green one, but they sent me a blue one. At the time of purchase, it didn't indicate that it was a mini, and I only realized it was a mini after receiving it."

top_reviews.title: NEVER WORKED--AVOID THIS SELLER
top_reviews.text: phone never worked.  Tried setting up with mint mobile--first, they thought the phone was still locked.  Had to wait for physical sim then went through  series of esim cards and then had to buy a physical sim from the store.  Every time mint swore they could fix it.  Finally MINT gave up and refunded me the money.  Brought it to apple and they said the phone has a damaged anennae which is why it never worked.  Customer service asked if it ever worked and i said NO and i want it to go back to you.  They then sent me an email saynig no even though i was within the 90 day timeframe.

top_reviews.title: Poor quailty phone sold for like new price.
top_reviews.text: Sold as "like new" the description for like new is "micro scratches not noticeable from 8-12 inches away." You can see the damage on the frame of this phone from 20 ft away. Be aware they are trying to sell you a poor quality phone for like new price hoping you are so desperate for the phone you jist wont return it. And if you do return it it will take them 3 weeks to give you the refund. Makes me wonder how people sleep at night taking advantage of people.

top_reviews.title: Deceptive Advertising. Phone was not "Like-New"!
top_reviews.text: If you are looking for a totally Refurbished Like new phone, I would look else where. I purchased an iPhone 13 mini that was advertised as "Like New", but was anything but. The glass had tones of scratches on both sides, one of which looked like an actual crack. the metal frame was chipped in multiple places, looking like the phone head been dropped many times. When I reached out to the seller their excuse was that the item ws mis-labeled was " Like-New" by Walmart and was not their fault. If you want to go through the hassle of ordering, receiving, then ultimately shipping back waiting for weeks for aa refund, by ll means order from this company. But if not I would look else where.

top_reviews.title: not show in the post how it should be
top_reviews.text: phone screen with alot of scratches and the back camera

product_info.title: Straight Talk Apple iPhone 16, 128GB, White - Prepaid Smartphone [Locked to Straight Talk]
product_info.short_description_html:
Superfast. Supersmart. Get the first iPhone built for Apple Intelligence1 with the iPhone 16 from Straight Talk.

With a supersmart A18 chip, jump two generations ahead of the A16 Bionic chip in iPhone 15 to enable Apple Intelligence, powering advanced photo and video features, and supportive console-level gaming, with exceptional power efficiency.

Apple Intelligence helps you write, express yourself, and get things done effortlessly, and groundbreaking privacy protection gives you peace of mind that no one else can access your data.

Take total camera control with an easier way to quickly access camera tools, like zoom or depth of field, so you can take the perfect shot in record time. The advanced dual-camera system features a 48MP Fusion camera, to capture stunning high-resolution images, with 2x optical-quality Telephoto and an improved 12MP Ultra Wide featuring autofocus.

Plus, iPhone 16 works together with the A18 chip to deliver a big boost in battery life with up to 22 hours video playback.2 Charge via USB-C or snap on a MagSafe charger for faster wireless charging.3

All this, with a design to last - as iPhone 16 has a sturdy, aerospace-grade aluminum design with a 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display.4 It's remarkably durable with the latest-generation Ceramic Shield material that's 2x tougher than any smartphone glass.

Pair the iPhone 16 with a Straight Talk no-contract plan featuring unlimited talk & text, plus 10GB of high-speed data starting at only $35/month for a single line, all on America's most reliable 5G network. 

To activate this device, a Straight Talk Wireless plan is required. Shop for the iPhone 16 online or at your local Walmart.

top_negative_reviews.title: Don’t buy it
top_negative_reviews.text: I bought this product and it’s the worst i have been trying to connect it with a carrier but it is unable to connect with any i have also tried changing my carrier and ended my wasting 50 dollars on the new eSIMs just to come to the conclusion that the device is at fault for unable to connect with any eSIM operator i am returning this device.

top_positive_reviews.title: iPhone 14 Pro Max. 128GB Space Black
top_positive_reviews.text: I'm pretty pleased w/ my phone. It came in better condition than i thought it would, i did see some VERY minor scratches along the edges of the screen but you really cant see them when holding the phone. Overall, I would definitely recommend buying this phone.

top_reviews.title: iPhone 14 Pro Max. 128GB Space Black
top_reviews.text: I'm pretty pleased w/ my phone. It came in better condition than i thought it would, i did see some VERY minor scratches along the edges of the screen but you really cant see them when holding the phone. Overall, I would definitely recommend buying this phone.

top_reviews.title: Phone: 5/5 FedEx Delivery instructions: 0/5
top_reviews.text:
I've been using the phone for a few days now and I love it!! I upgraded from a 12 and it's so much better, the battery life was at 86% when I bought it so it holds a charge very well! 
—My only complaint: It's mandatory to sign for the package through FedEx and can only be delivered during weekdays…So for 3 days I was at work to not get my new phone and had to end up driving to FedEx 3-4 days later to pick it up myself from the shipping location.

top_reviews.title: Not great, but doable
top_reviews.text: It was fine, works fine. Just don't think the refurbished process was done well. The old account was still connected and needed to have it factory reset, and the quality of the refurbishing was lacking since at the bottom left corner, there was a type of glue that had oozed out from behind the screen. This made the screen protector not adhere properly because bubbles were left behind.

top_reviews.title: Not worth the money!
top_reviews.text: Bought this phone because I could find a brand new one anywhere. It came on time and was exactly what I ordered, and the battery was at 98% health. However, when I set up the phone I found that Siri couldn’t hear my voice, voice memos couldn’t record my voice, and audio messages didn’t work. As well as some scratches and wear on the steel band. For the price of these “refurbished” phones might as well just buy one brand new, it’s not worth risking spending all that money just to gamble that the phone works…

top_reviews.title: Not the best experience
top_reviews.text: The phone came with several scratches on the screen that I was not expecting. I was trying to exchange it, but since it was for a gift it wouldn't arrive on time. Also, I have some issues with the shipment since the packages was marked as delivered but I don't receive it. I contacted Walmart and they told me to wait until Monday (it was Friday when I contacted them) since they said the package could arrive later. I contacted the carrier and they told me that it was going to take them about 8 business days to find it and they didn't have a picture of the shipment.  But finally, I found it myself walking around the neighborhood.

top_reviews.title: Don’t buy it
top_reviews.text: I bought this product and it’s the worst i have been trying to connect it with a carrier but it is unable to connect with any i have also tried changing my carrier and ended my wasting 50 dollars on the new eSIMs just to come to the conclusion that the device is at fault for unable to connect with any eSIM operator i am returning this device.

top_reviews.title: Please consider my experience before purchasing.
top_reviews.text: I purchased an iPhone 14 Pro Max fully unlocked listed in Like-New condition from Walmart's third party seller Kiss Electronics. Which Walmart describes Like-New condition as the item will be fully functional with minor to no imperfections. If the item has a screen, it will have no scratches on the screen. I received a phone with significant wear, the bezel had road rash and scratches throughout. The entire screen was filled with numerous deep engraved scratches and one scratch was at least an inch in length. It's fair to say the phone was rough and had been through a few battles. Also the phone was not properly packaged for shipping it loosely rattled in the box. I emailed kiss electronics and asked for the phone to be exchanged with a phone that meets Walmart's Like-New quality description. They declined and instead blamed Walmart for incorrectly listing the phone's condition. I was then advised to contact Walmart for a refund. I've included photos which show the condition of the phone to an extent but the pictures don't do it justice you can 10x it when inspecting in person. In conclusion Walmart issued me a refund and recommended to only purchase from sellers that have earned Pro-Seller status by Walmart.

Phone did not work phone said completely unlocked when I tried to set up my eSIM it said not supported of course it doesn't take a SIM card. Turn the phone off because there's no more uses for it power it back on now it just blinks on and off on top of all that the phone has scratches all over which was not a problem because I plan to cover with the case but phone completely does not work reached out to seller. It's been three days. I reached out to seller twice no response yet I will be contacting Walmart for full discount mail full refund. Please save your money. Do not buy. I paid $650 for iPhone 14 Pro Max for my son's birthday and his butt I received a faulty broken useless phone.

top_reviews.title: Trash
top_reviews.text: As I was putting the phone into the new case the back cracked.  I had the phone out of the box for an hour. It probably had a small crack I didn't notice right away.
