top_reviews.title: Phone: 5/5 FedEx Delivery instructions: 0/5
top_reviews.text:
I've been using the phone for a few days now and I love it!! I upgraded from a 12 and it's so much better, the battery life was at 86% when I bought it so it holds a charge very well! 
—My only complaint: It's mandatory to sign for the package through FedEx and can only be delivered during weekdays…So for 3 days I was at work to not get my new phone and had to end up driving to FedEx 3-4 days later to pick it up myself from the shipping location.

top_reviews.title: Not great, but doable
top_reviews.text: It was fine, works fine. Just don't think the refurbished process was done well. The old account was still connected and needed to have it factory reset, and the quality of the refurbishing was lacking since at the bottom left corner, there was a type of glue that had oozed out from behind the screen. This made the screen protector not adhere properly because bubbles were left behind.

top_reviews.title: Not worth the money!
top_reviews.text: Bought this phone because I could find a brand new one anywhere. It came on time and was exactly what I ordered, and the battery was at 98% health. However, when I set up the phone I found that Siri couldn’t hear my voice, voice memos couldn’t record my voice, and audio messages didn’t work. As well as some scratches and wear on the steel band. For the price of these “refurbished” phones might as well just buy one brand new, it’s not worth risking spending all that money just to gamble that the phone works…

top_reviews.title: Not the best experience
top_reviews.text: The phone came with several scratches on the screen that I was not expecting. I was trying to exchange it, but since it was for a gift it wouldn't arrive on time. Also, I have some issues with the shipment since the packages was marked as delivered but I don't receive it. I contacted Walmart and they told me to wait until Monday (it was Friday when I contacted them) since they said the package could arrive later. I contacted the carrier and they told me that it was going to take them about 8 business days to find it and they didn't have a picture of the shipment.  But finally, I found it myself walking around the neighborhood.

top_reviews.title: Don’t buy it

top_reviews.title: Please consider my experience before purchasing.
top_reviews.text: I purchased an iPhone 14 Pro Max fully unlocked listed in Like-New condition from Walmart's third party seller Kiss Electronics. Which Walmart describes Like-New condition as the item will be fully functional with minor to no imperfections. If the item has a screen, it will have no scratches on the screen. I received a phone with significant wear, the bezel had road rash and scratches throughout. The entire screen was filled with numerous deep engraved scratches and one scratch was at least an inch in length. It's fair to say the phone was rough and had been through a few battles. Also the phone was not properly packaged for shipping it loosely rattled in the box. I emailed kiss electronics and asked for the phone to be exchanged with a phone that meets Walmart's Like-New quality description. They declined and instead blamed Walmart for incorrectly listing the phone's condition. I was then advised to contact Walmart for a refund. I've included photos which show the condition of the phone to an extent but the pictures don't do it justice you can 10x it when inspecting in person. In conclusion Walmart issued me a refund and recommended to only purchase from sellers that have earned Pro-Seller status by Walmart.

Phone did not work phone said completely unlocked when I tried to set up my eSIM it said not supported of course it doesn't take a SIM card. Turn the phone off because there's no more uses for it power it back on now it just blinks on and off on top of all that the phone has scratches all over which was not a problem because I plan to cover with the case but phone completely does not work reached out to seller. It's been three days. I reached out to seller twice no response yet I will be contacting Walmart for full discount mail full refund. Please save your money. Do not buy. I paid $650 for iPhone 14 Pro Max for my son's birthday and his butt I received a faulty broken useless phone.

product_info.title: Pre-Owned Apple iPhone 12 Pro Max - Carrier Unlocked - 128 GB SILVER (Good)
product_info.short_description_html: This Apple iPhone 12 Pro Max has been professionally Used to working order by an approved vendor. Manufacturer UsedGrade B Fully Functional in Excellent Working Condition. 8/10 Cosmetic Rating. Fully Unlocked compatible with all carriers. All iPhone 12 Pro Max models have a haptic-touch capable 6.7" (diagonal) "Super Retina XDR" display (2778x1284, 458 ppi, 800 nits max brightness) that occupies nearly the entire front of the device. It has four cameras. On the front -- tucked in the "notch" -- is a "TrueDepth" camera that in addition to supporting "Advanced Face ID" identification functionality, takes 12 megapixel photos, shoots 4K video, and has software support for Portrait mode, Portrait lighting, and more. The rear packs a 4K video-capable "pro 12 megapixel camera system" with three cameras -- Ultra Wide (f/2.4 aperture, 120-degree field of view), Wide (f/1.6 aperture, sensor-shift optical image stabilization), and Telephoto (f/2.2 aperture). Apple notes that the iPhone 12 Pro Max provides "computational photography" features that improve low-light performance and reduce noise compared to earlier iPhone models. The iPhone 12 Pro Max uses a partially "surgical grade" stainless steel case with flat polished stainless steel sides and has a glass front and back. The front has a "Ceramic Shield" cover for improved durability and the back has an integrated "MagSafe" magnetic charging connection. It is splash, water, and dust-resistant to the IP68 standard (maximum depth of 6 meters up to 30 minutes). Internally, the iPhone 12 Pro Max is powered by a 64-bit 3.0 GHz "Apple A14 Bionic" processor with six cores -- two performance cores and four high-efficiency cores -- and a 16-core Neural Engine. It has 6 GB of RAM and 128 GB,of flash storage. It also supports 802.11ax Wi-Fi 6 with 2x2 MIMO, 5G wireless, Bluetooth 5.0, Ultra Wideband "for spatial awareness," NFC for Apple Pay, "Express Cards with power reserve" for compatible transit systems, a LiDAR scanner, and dual SIMs (one hardware nano SIM and one software-based eSIM).

It is a step down from the iPhone 12 Pro Max in terms of size and some features, but still offers many of the advanced features and capabilities found in its larger counterpart. The iPhone 12 Pro features a 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR OLED display with a resolution of 2532 x 1170 pixels. It is powered by Apple's A14 Bionic chip, which delivers fast and efficient performance. The phone also has an impressive camera system.

top_negative_reviews.title: Scam is going by this pro seller
top_negative_reviews.text: Firstly, I strongly advise against purchasing anything from this seller. They are collaborating with Walmart and selling subpar products. I received a phone with damage and promptly reported it to the seller. The next day, I returned the phone to the Walmart store. After 2-3 days, they sent me an email stating that the return form was damaged from their website and that we couldn't refund the money due to their return policy. Despite being 4 years old, the phone was in Chinese and showed 100% battery health. It also shut down during a call. I will also report the seller to Walmart's customer care. Walmart is considering refunding my money, but they are still receiving money from the seller. Therefore, I believe Walmart should remove the seller from the pro seller category. I will continue to update this review every week to raise awareness about this scam and prevent others from falling victim to it

product_info.title: Restored Apple iPhone SE (3rd Generation) - Fully Unlocked - 64 GB Product (Red) (Refurbished)
product_info.short_description_html: Restored Serious power meets serious value with the iPhone SE in Black from SIMPLE Mobile. A lightning-fast A15 Bionic chip and fast 5G(1) connectivity make this the most powerful 4.7-inch(2) iPhone ever. Enjoy up to 15 hours(3) of video playback on a Retina HD display made from the toughest glass available in a smartphone. Go big with stellar battery life and a superstar camera system featuring a 12MP Wide camera, Smart HDR 4, Photographic Styles, Portrait mode, and 4K video up to 60 fps. Share the moment with friends and family in stunning detail on the 7MP FaceTime HD camera with 1080p video recording. This iPhone is built for life-on-the-go with a durable, IP67 water resistant(4) design and a Home button with secure Touch ID. You’ll love the power and the possibilities of iOS 15, which packs new features to do more with iPhone than ever before(5). Pair it with an unlimited talk, text & data plan with coverage on a powerful nationwide 5G network without a contract from SIMPLE Mobile to keep you connected for less. Legal Disclaimers (1) Data plan required. 5G is available in select markets and through select carriers. Speeds vary based on site conditions and carrier. For details on 5G support, contact your carrier and see apple/iphone/cellular. (2) Display size is measured diagonally. (3) Battery life varies by use and configuration. See apple website for more information. (4) iPhone SE (3rd generation) has a rating of IP67 under IEC standard 60529 (maximum depth of 1 meter up to 30 minutes) [Refurbished]

top_negative_reviews.title: Scratches all over the screen!
top_negative_reviews.text:
Very disappointed. The screen is filled with little scratches all over! You'd think for a refurbished phone that they would replace the screen but no. I should have went with my gut and not ordered based off the negative reviews. But, there were many positive ones so I decided to give it a shot.
Everything works on the phone as far as I can tell right now. But the screen was disappointing.

top_positive_reviews.title: For the price, a great deal.
top_positive_reviews.text: If you buy a refurbished phone at 1/3 the price of a new one, can you really expect it to be perfect? There's a couple small hairline scratches on my screen but nothing severe. I now have a 2020 iPhone for only $130 and couldn't be happier. Battery in good condition %26 included charger.

top_reviews.title: Great phone
top_reviews.text: Phone is in excellent condition with a few superficial scratches on the lease that are only visible at certain angles and lighting. Otherwise it is practically a new phone for less! Word of advice don’t use the enclosed SIM card, ting mobile is a horrible company. They canceled my service after 6 hours without explanation and when contacted, customer service refused to offer any further assistance.

top_reviews.title: best christmas present
top_reviews.text:
i had anxiety purchasing this product due to the negative reviews. 
this purchase was for my almost 10 year old daughter. the battery came at 98% (which is better than the reviews i seen on this product) %26 not a scratch on the phone. completely unlocked, with a screen protector already in place. it came with a charging cable %26 box (not authentically apple but who cares) i am very happy with this purchase %26 so is my daughter, i would purchase again.

top_reviews.title: Good Little Phone (for the most part)
top_reviews.text: If you are in need of an iPhone, but can’t afford to pay an arm and a leg for the newest iPhone, then this is for you. It works just as well as any other iPhone, and has a surprisingly good camera for such a small phone with a single lens. However, there are some things you should be aware of. For one thing, it doesn’t have 5G access. Just 4G/LTE, but no big deal if you’re not picky about 5G. However, my main complaint is the battery life. The battery drains pretty fast, especially when watching videos, such as off YouTube and TikTok. It would be a better buy if it wasn’t for the poor battery life.

top_reviews.title: Will continue to purchase refurbished phones
top_reviews.text: There is a relatively obvious scratch on the front screen that does not impede my ability to use the device. I do not have any complaints with this phone. I was able to use my previous SIM card in it, it holds a charge well, and my information copied over without issue. This a a good phone so far and an affordable and environmentally responsible alternative to buying a new phone.

top_reviews.title: Refurbished? More like Preowned…
top_reviews.text: Cosmetics of the device could be better there’s minor scrapes on the corners but nothing to drastic. Along with refurbishing the battery life by a battery change out would’ve have been great too, but for what it will be used for it’ll work. On the positive side of things it came with a screen protector already put on it that looked magnificent!

top_reviews.title: Scratches all over the screen!
top_reviews.text:
Very disappointed. The screen is filled with little scratches all over! You'd think for a refurbished phone that they would replace the screen but no. I should have went with my gut and not ordered based off the negative reviews. But, there were many positive ones so I decided to give it a shot.
Everything works on the phone as far as I can tell right now. But the screen was disappointing.

top_reviews.title: Marketplace purchases SUCK!!!
top_reviews.text: It took hours to transfer info from my old iPhone to the new one.  After all that time, it didn't work.  Tried to remove my information to return and was not able.  I took it to cellphone store in Walmart and was told it could not remove information because the buttons were not working.  I went to customer service to return and was given a receipt with a tracking %23.  When I entered the tracking %23 on Fedex, it said that number did not exist.  I am very disappointed with my entire purchase.  I thought I was getting a cellphone from Walmart, only to find out it was from Marketplace and it could take up to ten business days before I get a refund (that's if I ever get one).

top_reviews.title: Terrible service/sub-par product
top_reviews.text:
One star is more for the seller than the product. I would give the seller less if possible. The product might get two stars on its own merit. I purchased an IPhone SE for my daughter for Christmas. Turns out the battery is junk and the phone will only go a couple hours before dying. I reached out to the seller and experienced some of the worst customer service I've ever encountered. My Walmart account tells me that it is returnable for 3 months. When I reached out to the seller to see how they could make it right, the told me I only had 30 days and I was two days past that, if I attempted to return it they would block Walmart from returning my money. 
Bottom line, I don't think anyone should do business with this seller. Read the reviews, there are many who have had the same experience.

top_reviews.title: A Straight Dud!
top_reviews.text: The phone truly looked the part! Was in great shape! And for the price it definitely seemed worth it! Here's the kicker…the phone wouldn't stay on. It kept going off every few minutes when you tried to use it. Someone told me to try to update it and that may solve the problem. It wouldn't stay on long enough to take the update. You'd be watching it begin the updating process and then it would shut off and begin to reload like you'd just cut the phone on. Ended up having to send it back! What else could I do with it? Definitely was a waste of time and money! Sad part is, this is my first experience with using this seller. How could I recommend this seller if this is my story to tell about my first experience with this seller?!

product_info.title: Restored Apple iPhone SE (3rd Generation) - Fully Unlocked - 64 GB Product (Red) (Refurbished)
product_info.short_description_html: Restored Serious power meets serious value with the iPhone SE in Black from SIMPLE Mobile. A lightning-fast A15 Bionic chip and fast 5G(1) connectivity make this the most powerful 4.7-inch(2) iPhone ever. Enjoy up to 15 hours(3) of video playback on a Retina HD display made from the toughest glass available in a smartphone. Go big with stellar battery life and a superstar camera system featuring a 12MP Wide camera, Smart HDR 4, Photographic Styles, Portrait mode, and 4K video up to 60 fps. Share the moment with friends and family in stunning detail on the 7MP FaceTime HD camera with 1080p video recording. This iPhone is built for life-on-the-go with a durable, IP67 water resistant(4) design and a Home button with secure Touch ID. You’ll love the power and the possibilities of iOS 15, which packs new features to do more with iPhone than ever before(5). Pair it with an unlimited talk, text & data plan with coverage on a powerful nationwide 5G network without a contract from SIMPLE Mobile to keep you connected for less. Legal Disclaimers (1) Data plan required. 5G is available in select markets and through select carriers. Speeds vary based on site conditions and carrier. For details on 5G support, contact your carrier and see apple/iphone/cellular. (2) Display size is measured diagonally. (3) Battery life varies by use and configuration. See apple website for more information. (4) iPhone SE (3rd generation) has a rating of IP67 under IEC standard 60529 (maximum depth of 1 meter up to 30 minutes) [Refurbished]

  • iPhone SE features the familiar Home button with Touch ID — an easy, private, and secure alternative for logging in to apps, authorizing App Store purchases, making Apple Pay transactions, and more.<

top_reviews.title: Kind of disappointed
top_reviews.text:
Let me start first by saying that I am appreciative of getting this phone. But there are a few problems that I just do not agree on. First, it was the shipping . They said it would be here next day and it didn't get here until a week and a half later. I did get the phone and I do understand it's refurbished but the charger port is not holding the charger as it should be. The phone battery is at 83% usually a refurbished phone can get pushed up to 100%. That's probably why they gave us the wireless charger because the charger port is loser than it should be. 

On the brighter side everything else is great

Love the phone itself but I'm already having troubles w it. My battery doesn't want to charge up all the way, and struggles to retain battery, my screen freezes up some here and there and other times will not respond to my touch. But other than that I love it

product_info.title: Restored Apple iPhone SE 16GB, Silver - Unlocked GSM (Refurbished)
product_info.short_description_html: The moment you use iPhone 6s Plus, you know you've never felt anything like it. With a single press, 3D Touch lets you do more than ever before. Live Photos bring your memories to life in a powerfully vivid way. And that's just the beginning. Take a deeper look at iPhone 6s Plus, and you'll find innovation on every level. The original iPhone introduced the world to Multi-Touch, forever changing the way people experience technology. With 3D Touch, you can do things that were never possible before. It senses how deeply you press the display, letting you do all kinds of essential things more quickly and simply. And it gives you real-time feedback in the form of subtle taps from the all-new Taptic Engine. The 12-megapixel iSight camera captures sharp, detailed photos. It takes brilliant 4K video, up to four times the resolution of 1080p HD video. iPhone 6s Plus also takes selfies worthy of a self-portrait with the new 5-megapixel FaceTime HD camera. And it introduces Live Photos, a new way to relive your favorite memories. It captures the moments just before and after your picture and sets it in motion with just the press of a finger.

top_positive_reviews.title: It's Alright
top_positive_reviews.text: Camera works and functions like new, only issue is, well, it's used obviously. top_reviews.title: Camera had been replaced and was still cracked
top_reviews.text: The camera had been replaced with an aftermarket camera (not Apple) but even so, the main lens still had a crack in it. The phone acknowledged that the camera wasn't authentic, which I was slightly annoyed with on setup but figured it's refurbished, that's why the replaced camera. But then on setup, the camera lens still had a crack in it which shows up in every picture and makes it impossible to deposit checks via mobile deposit because the crack shows up over the capture. The rest of the phone is fine, so that's why I rated it as two stars but it's annoying to buy a phone that should be good to go, only to find out it still needs to have repairs done.

product_info.title: Pre-Owned Apple iPhone X, 5.8" display 64GB GSM Unlocked, Space Gray
product_info.short_description_html: Our vision has always been to create an iPhone that is entirely screen. One so immersive the device itself disappears into the experience. And so intelligent it can respond to a tap, your voice, and even a glance. With iPhone X, that vision is now a reality. Say hello to the future.
product_info.short_description_text: Our vision has always been to create an iPhone that is entirely screen. One so immersive the device itself disappears into the experience. And so intelligent it can respond to a tap, your voice, and even a glance. With iPhone X, that vision is now a reality. Say hello to the future.
product_info.long_description_html:
Key Features and Benefits:

  • Super Retina display
    With iPhone X, the device is the display. An Super Retina screen fills the hand and dazzles the eyes.
  • Innovative technology
    The display employs advanced techniques and technology to precisely follow the curves of the design, all the way to the elegantly rounded corners.
  • TrueDepth camera
    A tiny space houses sophisticated technology, including the cameras and sensors that enable Face ID.
  • Secure authentication
    Your face is your password. Face ID is a secure way to unlock, authenticate, and pay.
  • Improved cameras
    A larger and faster 12 MP sensor. A better color filter. Deeper pixels. And a telephoto camera with OIS.
  • Wireless charging
    With no charging cable required, iPhone X is truly designed for the future of wireless.

What's Included:

  • Apple iPhone X
  • Power adapter, Apple EarPods with Lightning Connector, Lightning to USB cable

top_reviews.title: Dirty phones and deceptive item title.
top_reviews.text: They don't even clean the phones. They ship dirty and full of previous owner's hand oils and God knows what else. In this time of Covid you would think that cleanliness would be a priority, but not with this seller. If they don't even clean the phones, I doubt they are actually refurbished. Probably just repackaged and shipped with not verification of full functionality. Also, most other sellers add the word "Used" or "Refurbished" to their item description but they do not, leading you to think items are new.

the phone doesn't work as well as advertised. im on not even a full 12 hours of having it and have already had to restart it because its glitching out of control. There are also issues with the charging process. It has to be on the charger without being touched for about 30 minutes to an hour before it begins charging.

product_info.title: Pre-Owned Apple iPhone X, 5.8" display 64GB GSM Unlocked, Space Gray
product_info.short_description_html: Our vision has always been to create an iPhone that is entirely screen. One so immersive the device itself disappears into the experience. And so intelligent it can respond to a tap, your voice, and even a glance. With iPhone X, that vision is now a reality. Say hello to the future.
product_info.short_description_text: Our vision has always been to create an iPhone that is entirely screen. One so immersive the device itself disappears into the experience. And so intelligent it can respond to a tap, your voice, and even a glance. With iPhone X, that vision is now a reality. Say hello to the future.
product_info.long_description_html:
Key Features and Benefits:

  • Super Retina display
    With iPhone X, the device is the display. An Super Retina screen fills the hand and dazzles the eyes.
  • Innovative technology
    The display employs advanced techniques and technology to precisely follow the curves of the design, all the way to the elegantly rounded corners.
  • TrueDepth camera
    A tiny space houses sophisticated technology, including the cameras and sensors that enable Face ID.
  • Secure authentication
    Your face is your password. Face ID is a secure way to unlock, authenticate, and pay.
  • Improved cameras
    A larger and faster 12 MP sensor. A better color filter. Deeper pixels. And a telephoto camera with OIS.
  • Wireless charging
    With no charging cable required, iPhone X is truly designed for the future of wireless.

What's Included:

  • Apple iPhone X
  • Power adapter, Apple EarPods with Lightning Connector, Lightning to USB cable

top_negative_reviews.title: Dishonest sale
top_negative_reviews.text: These people are scammers, do not buy from them, they are selling something that is not as advertised. They claim the product is grade A, but that's a lie, it's a bad refurbished product. The product has a lot of big scratches and the battery overheats. When I bought the product the title said "grade A condition" and now they changed the title and left out this description which is really dishonest.

top_positive_reviews.title: Refurbished or bust!
top_positive_reviews.text: I always buy refurbished. I do not see paying outrageous prices just for a new phone when refurbished works just as well and costs so much less. If you are on the fence about buying refurbished, just do it! I've had this iPhone 12 for a while now and it's performing perfectly. It was easy to set up and get going by installing my old SIM card. The phone kept giving me a notification that the camera may not work properly because it was repaired by someone other than Apple, but the camera works perfectly and I was able to figure out how to dismiss the notification. :)  9/10 experience just because of the notification issue.

top_reviews.title: Fast and easy.
top_reviews.text: Easy process came on the said date it was supposed to come on no complaints here.

top_reviews.title: iPhone 12 review
top_reviews.text: Great condition, like new.

top_reviews.title: Happy 12 yr old !!
top_reviews.text: Although he would have been happy with a Mini, he was and is completely satisfied with my selection.  At this point there have been no issues. 😁😁

top_reviews.title: Refurbished or bust!
top_reviews.text: I always buy refurbished. I do not see paying outrageous prices just for a new phone when refurbished works just as well and costs so much less. If you are on the fence about buying refurbished, just do it! I've had this iPhone 12 for a while now and it's performing perfectly. It was easy to set up and get going by installing my old SIM card. The phone kept giving me a notification that the camera may not work properly because it was repaired by someone other than Apple, but the camera works perfectly and I was able to figure out how to dismiss the notification. :)  9/10 experience just because of the notification issue.

top_reviews.title: The phone was in very nice shape
top_reviews.text: The phone was very nice. It looked as if it was brand new. The phone works very well. No problems at all.

top_reviews.title: It was okay
top_reviews.text: The phone was listed as Grade A with minimum signs of wear but the appearance when I received it was not. There were several scratches and it was not like new as described! The phone did function well with a 88% battery heath but I am disappointed with the physical appearance!

top_reviews.title: Dishonest sale
top_reviews.text: These people are scammers, do not buy from them, they are selling something that is not as advertised. They claim the product is grade A, but that's a lie, it's a bad refurbished product. The product has a lot of big scratches and the battery overheats. When I bought the product the title said "grade A condition" and now they changed the title and left out this description which is really dishonest.

top_reviews.title: Do NOT purchase!
top_reviews.text: Pictures did NOT match the product. The phone was scratched and scraped up all along the edges horribly (like a dog got to it) as though someone did a shanty screen replacement job. The battery it came with is NOT an apple battery and it displays a warning saying so. It glitches out, screen turns black and overheats. Hands down the WORST product I have ever received through online ordering. So disappointed as it was my daughter's 16th birthday gift and it was literally just a waste of money that I now can't replace.

Phone was expected to be Grade A condition.. The device had deep scratches and dents in the corners and back of phone. Phone looked like it fell so many times. The screen and the back of the phone was not looking good.

top_reviews.title: Crappy phone, Crappy description, Crappy company

My 13-year-old son is highly upset and very disappointed. If you know what teenagers are like then you know how much flack I'm getting, so thanks.

top_reviews.title: very unsatisfied.
top_reviews.text: *These phones are not like new* This phone came with a cheap knock off apple charger. As well as the actual phone itself has too many issues for the money i paid. 1- low battery health. 2- the keyboard gets stuck %26 you have to press the screen harder or more than once to do anything. Don't waste your money.

top_reviews.title: Too good to be true
top_reviews.text: I received the phone yesterday and put it on the charger right away as there was maybe only 10% left on the battery. It was taking it forever to charge, but I needed a phone as mine had stopped working. I switched everything over and then plugged it back to the charger. Overnight, it barely made it to 90% after being on the charger not being used for 12  hours. On my 1 hour commute to work, the battery went from 90% to 54ish within that hour and that phone had not been used. I tried to plug it up to my charger at work and it showed it was charging, but the battery life continued to drop. I even went and bought a new charger with the hopes it would work. It didn't and it kept on dropping. At this point, I thought maybe it would be best to power off the phone and let it charge for a while that way. When I turned the phone back on, the screen wouldn't work and there was less charge to the phone than at the time i powered it off. If I had to take a guess, the phone has probably never been refurbished as stated, and was just repackage to quickly sell. I instantly started the refund process and will be taking the phone back to my local Wal-Mart ASAP. Luckily, I was able to find the same phone through Straight Talk, brand new, for not much more than the price for this one. I was able to get free shipping as well and have it to me within 1-2 days.

top_reviews.title: Phone doa
top_reviews.text: Phone dead one arrival. Battery exploding prior to opening box and screen was scratched. Awaiting response.

top_reviews.title: Turns off randomly
top_reviews.text: This phone randomly shuts off every few minutes which is extremely irritating and frustrating for anyone, but I work from home on my phone and have two toddlers already testing my every day sanity and patience enough as it is to have to also deal with this. Highly disappointed and would not recommend.

top_positive_reviews.title: Battery life 84
top_positive_reviews.text: The phone arrived in excellent condition; it looks and feels brand new, and it's clear that it was well taken care of. I'm very impressed with how it performs overall. The only issue I've noticed is with the battery health—it's at 84%, which isn't terrible, but the listing mentioned it should be at least 90%. While it's not a major problem and the phone still lasts through a full day of use, I was hoping for better battery health. That said, it's a minor concern and doesn't take away from how satisfied I am with the device overall.

top_reviews.title: 0 out of 5 stars
top_reviews.text: I bought this refurbished iPhone 12 because my iPhone 11 had a bad battery. When i received the phone (late) I opened the package and notice it was in very bad shape. The corners were chipped and the screen had bad scratches all over. I proceeded to plug the phone in to charge, and noticed it would charge then it wouldn't, on and off. Even after that I tried playing with the obo e and it froze. I immediately put everything back in the package to get a refund. I can't believe this is what I got for $300.

product_info.title: Straight Talk Apple iPhone 16 Pro, 128GB, White Titanium - Prepaid Smartphone [Locked to Straight Talk]
product_info.short_description_html:
A Pro studio in your pocket. Get the first iPhone built for Apple Intelligence1 with the iPhone 16 Pro from Straight Talk.

With a supersmart A18 chip, jump two generations ahead of the A16 Bionic chip in iPhone 15 to enable Apple Intelligence, powering advanced photo and video features, and supportive console-level gaming, with exceptional power efficiency. 

Apple Intelligence helps you write, express yourself, and get things done effortlessly, and groundbreaking privacy protection gives you peace of mind that no one else can access your data.

Take your videos to a whole new level with 4K 120 fps Dolby Vision, enabled by the 48MP Fusion camera. Capture stunning high-resolution images, with 2x optical-quality Telephoto and an improved 12MP Ultra Wide camera, featuring autofocus.

iPhone 16 Pro works together with the A18 chip to deliver a big boost in battery life with up to 27 hours video playback.2 Charge via USB-C or snap on a MagSafe charger for faster wireless charging.3

All this, with stunning titanium design. iPhone 16 Pro has a strong and light titanium design with a larger 6.3-inch Super Retina XDR display.4 It's remarkably durable with the latest-generation Ceramic Shield material that's 2x tougher than any smartphone glass.

Pair the iPhone 16 Pro with a Straight Talk no-contract plan featuring unlimited talk & text, plus 10GB of high-speed data starting at only $35/month for a single line, all on America's most reliable 5G network. 

To activate this device, a Straight Talk Wireless plan is required. Shop for the iPhone 16 Pro online or at your local Walmart.

product_info.short_description_html:
A Pro studio in your pocket. Get the first iPhone built for Apple Intelligence1 with the iPhone 16 Pro from Straight Talk.

With a supersmart A18 chip, jump two generations ahead of the A16 Bionic chip in iPhone 15 to enable Apple Intelligence, powering advanced photo and video features, and supportive console-level gaming, with exceptional power efficiency. 

Apple Intelligence helps you write, express yourself, and get things done effortlessly, and groundbreaking privacy protection gives you peace of mind that no one else can access your data.

Take your videos to a whole new level with 4K 120 fps Dolby Vision, enabled by the 48MP Fusion camera. Capture stunning high-resolution images, with 2x optical-quality Telephoto and an improved 12MP Ultra Wide camera, featuring autofocus.

iPhone 16 Pro works together with the A18 chip to deliver a big boost in battery life with up to 27 hours video playback.2 Charge via USB-C or snap on a MagSafe charger for faster wireless charging.3

All this, with stunning titanium design. iPhone 16 Pro has a strong and light titanium design with a larger 6.3-inch Super Retina XDR display.4 It's remarkably durable with the latest-generation Ceramic Shield material that's 2x tougher than any smartphone glass.

Pair the iPhone 16 Pro with a Straight Talk no-contract plan featuring unlimited talk & text, plus 10GB of high-speed data starting at only $35/month for a single line, all on America's most reliable 5G network. 

To activate this device, a Straight Talk Wireless plan is required. Shop for the iPhone 16 Pro online or at your local Walmart.

top_reviews.title: Honest truth about a used phone.
top_reviews.text: This was a good buy for a deal when it was on sale for $500.00. Theirs some cosmetic defects such as some scratches along the sides of the phone, they are more like knicks and are about 1cm not a bunch and not big at all. There is none in the screen or back glass or camera. The phone is fully functional and clean as well as running very smoothly (wrote on day 2 of using new phone). It had a 87% battery life when I got it. For a used iPhone 13 Pro at $500.00 this is a steal. Don't expect it to be perfect it's been used. But it's been refurbished pretty well. Do expect minor cosmetic defects and the battery health to not be super good it's not like I bought a brand new phone out of box. I'm giving it 4/5 only because I wish the battery health was at least 90%. But for the price I can't complain!

top_reviews.title: Excellent purchase
top_reviews.text: The phone came to me in excellent condition, with the spec of a light brand on the back, so far it has worked well for 2 weeks using it, I think it's a good purchase.

top_reviews.title: Defected Bluetooth
top_reviews.text: This iPhone 13 Pro was suppose to be restored to like new condition, but the screen wasn't bright and the Bluetooth didn't work! I couldn't connect my Apple Watch, Beats headphones, stereo, or truck Bluetooth! I reset the network settings and everything! I contacted the seller and they informed me that they didn't do replacements! Who does business like that?

top_reviews.title: Cracked screen and wrong charging cable.
top_reviews.text: As-received phone has cracked screen and the included cable is not the right one. Phone was in a box with no buffer material. Not sure if the damage was due to shipping. Returned it immediately.

top_reviews.title: It was good but many minor scraches
top_reviews.text: It was an alright deal but it came with many minor scratches even when it is said little to no scratches. And a little piece was broken of from the edge of the phone

top_reviews.title: Too good to be true
top_reviews.text: I purchased a Restored Apple iPhone 13 Pro Graphite (Unlocked) (Refurbished).  Per the description "It is in excellent condition with little to no light scratches, scuffs and no blemishes... Fully functional product in Like New Condition. Item may have very light micro-scratches, invisible at a distance of 8-12 inches (arm's length)." Upon receiving the product the screen was fine but the frame had major scruffs, scratches, and chunks out of the body. It was seen from arm fully extended. And upon receiving the product, it was labeled as B . If I were to have purchased a "good condition / B  rated" phone I would have been happy. But it was falsely advertised. Beware of this seller promoting products incorrectly.

top_negative_reviews.text: Phone was BLACK LISTED according to ATT. I hired a company to install my old phone to my new phone, and the new phone would not go off SOS so he called ATT. They told him then that the phone was black listed meaning it was either stolen or not paid for.

top_positive_reviews.title: Satisfied with refurbished products
top_positive_reviews.text: This is my second refurbished iPhone from Walmart and love that I can buy it cheaper than new iPhone and still get the same quality. My last phone was iPhone X and loved it just wanted an upgrade. Both phones near mint condition when I received them and received them in a timely fashion.

top_reviews.title: Scam
top_reviews.text: The products were a scam. Worst quality ever, the devices were with aftermarket parts and blacklisted devices. The Walmart return process is equally horrible, despite endless promises by Walmart to get resolution it is taking them forever to get my money back.

top_reviews.text: Phone came in ABSOLUTELY Terrible condition
Screen very bad and battery died on like hour

top_reviews.text:
Phone was not working as it should. It showed that money was still owed on the phone.  

I attempted to contact seller and they did not respond.

product_info.title: Pre-Owned Apple iPhone 12 Pro 128GB GSM/CDMA Fully Unlocked - Silver (Good)
product_info.short_description_html: 5G speed, A14 Bionic, the fastest chip in a smartphone. An edge-to-edge OLED display. Ceramic Shield with four times better drop performance. And Night mode on every camera. iPhone 12 has it all. 5G on iPhone is superfast. So you can download movies on the fly. Stream higher-quality video. Or FaceTime in HD over cellular. With lots less lag. And you can do it in more places, because iPhone 12 has the broadest 5G coverage worldwide. A14 Bionic is the fastest chip in a smartphone. And it pushes what’s possible. Like crunching trillions of operations on the Neural Engine. Or shooting in Dolby Vision — even pro movie cameras can’t do that. It’s superefficient for great battery life. And it’s ahead of its time, prepared to power pretty much anything that comes next. Vastly more contrast. Incredible color accuracy. A huge jump in pixel density. OLED delivers brighter brights, darker blacks, and higher resolution for everything you look at. This is the best iPhone display we’ve ever made, and it goes all the way to the edge. Both the Wide and Ultra Wide cameras now have Night mode — and it’s better than ever at capturing incredible low-light shots. The new Wide camera brings in 27 percent more light. So whether you take photos by day or by moonlight, you’ll get a level of detail and color that wasn’t possible before. Night mode senses when light is low and kicks in automatically, maintaining clarity while capturing beautiful vibrant color. All you have to do is start snapping. Deep Fusion, in mid to low light, analyzes multiple exposures to maximize detail. Check out the texture in the wood, fabric, and crystal. And the Ultra Wide gets you a heroic perspective. Smart HDR 3 balances the elements in a shot, bringing out detail in the subject and trees while retaining the rich color of the sky — even at high noon. Beyond faces, Smart HDR 3 uses machine learning to recognize scenes, then adjusts sharpness, color, and white balance where needed. Even in bright light, Smart HDR 3 is amazing at capturing texture, skin tone, color saturation, and individual details that make photos feel true to life. Portrait mode is even better at artfully blurring the background to put all the focus on your subject. How do you improve on the highest-quality video in a smartphone? Make it even better in low light — a full 27 percent better. That means no hour is off limits for more beautifully detailed video. Then there’s Night mode Time-lapse. Just prop up your iPhone and let the light trails begin. Now you can record 4K HDR video with Dolby Vision. Edit in Photos or iMovie. Then zap it to your TV using AirPlay to see all that color and detail. It’s a start-to-finish cinematic experience — found only on iPhone. Which comes in handy when your dog does something adorable. Snap on a new MagSafe case, wallet, or both. (Fear not, the wallet is shielded so it’s safe for credit cards.) Magnets align themselves perfectly every time for faster wireless charging. iOS 14 is packed with shortcuts that get you just what you want, right when you want it. iPhone is designed to protect your information. Face ID data doesn’t leave your iPhone and is never backed up to iCloud or anywhere else. iOS shows you an app’s privacy practices before you download it. When you use Apple Pay, your card number isn’t shared with merchants. And the list goes on. To charge your new iPhone, you can continue to use your USB‑A to Lightning cable. Or you can take advantage of fast charging with the USB‑C to Lightning cable now included in the box, which works with existing USB‑C power adapters and computer ports.

  • Pro camera system with 12MP Ultra Wide, Wide, and Telephoto cameras; 4x optical zoom range; Night mode, Deep Fusion, Smart HDR 3, Apple ProRAW, 4K Dolby Vision HDR recording

top_reviews.title: As described
top_reviews.text: Works great, looks new and was a whole lot cheaper than brand new price

top_reviews.title: Like New but way less
top_reviews.text:
Purchased iPhone 13 used in like new condition from Walmart online.
It was just as described. Everything works great on it. Couldn't be happier, especially for the price. 
Took forever to decide which one I  wanted as there are way more pretty colors since I bought my old iPhone XR.

top_reviews.title: the phone is superb!
top_reviews.text: the phone itself is absolutely pristine condition!  i was expecting a minor scratch here or there and this device looks out of the box new. Now i ordered my phones unlocked so that i can easily transfer my xfinity mobile service over, as well as my daughters, and for some reason it shows up as still locked when xfinity tried activating. But when we look up the imei all that it clearly says unlocked not black listed has been paid in full . I ended up trying to just put my old sim into the new phone and so far it has worked! So i'm not sure what xfinity meant. However so far so good as far as quality carrier
Phone sticks a bit but other than that so good so far.
Is quality very good

top_reviews.title: Not updated
top_reviews.text: I couldn't transfer my info by placing the phones next to each other bc the new phone wouldn't update. So I went through the cloud. It took a long time and none of the apps transferred. I'm putting all the apps on it, but ok so far. The volume isn't as loud as my other iPhone but I'll adjust. Otherwise it seems to be a good phone.

top_reviews.title: iPhone 12
top_reviews.text: The screen is in good shape and phone works fine so far. Totally unlocked as it advertised. Easy to set up service. Not overly happy about the condition of the edges as it was also advertised as “like new” and I realize how far our screens and cameras have come since the 12. But overall, good experience.
The speaker was broken and I had to send it back
The phone is good looking at it but gets really hot to the point to almost burn me

top_reviews.title: iPhone 12 purple
top_reviews.text: Disappointed with the product bc description states this phone is like new condition and when I received it there is many nicks and scratches all over the phone. It's in “ok” condition and I wouldn't pay as much as what I did for it knowing the condition it was in.

top_negative_reviews.title: Very misleading product description.
top_negative_reviews.text: The phone was not as advertised "unopened Box" in excellent condition.  The phone had obvious usage marks on it.   Worn volume %26 on/off  buttons, pop socket marks on the back, and an error saying parts had been replaced on it that were not apple certified....  On top of all that the screen cut out on it frequently.  Luckily Walmart is saying I can return the product.

top_positive_reviews.title: Performs as advertised without exception !
top_positive_reviews.text: Item listing was complete and accurate.  Delivery was on time without any complications. Unpacked and set up item without any surprises.  Worked as described.  Continues to perform as it should.  Great transaction from every respect.

top_reviews.title: Performs as advertised without exception !
top_reviews.text: Item listing was complete and accurate.  Delivery was on time without any complications. Unpacked and set up item without any surprises.  Worked as described.  Continues to perform as it should.  Great transaction from every respect.

top_reviews.title: AMAZING
top_reviews.text: This phone was a birthday gift %26 is absolutely amazing %26 was in mint condition! I had no issues with transferring the unlocked phone to carrier from the other iPhone. I highly recommend the seller and I 100% without hesitation would purchase from them again. Shipping was also super fast %26 the price was excellent! 5 stars here!!!

top_reviews.title: iPhone 14
top_reviews.text: The phone is a good phone, but when you first turned it on, it was all in Japanese so I had to use my other phone as a tutorial to work through how to change the language to English that it's been great. It's been great the phone is a good phone, but when you first turned it on, it was all in Japanese so I had to use my other phone as a tutorial to work through how to change the language to English. I also had to use the second IMEI for AT%26T to use it.Other than that it's a good phone.

top_reviews.title: Scratched
top_reviews.text: Description said open box unused but it has obviously been used by the scratches all over the phone and camera. There was even a screenshot left in the camera roll, and it didn't give me an initial start up screen so I could tell it wasn't even factory reset.

top_reviews.title: Very misleading product description.
top_reviews.text: The phone was not as advertised "unopened Box" in excellent condition.  The phone had obvious usage marks on it.   Worn volume %26 on/off  buttons, pop socket marks on the back, and an error saying parts had been replaced on it that were not apple certified....  On top of all that the screen cut out on it frequently.  Luckily Walmart is saying I can return the product.

top_negative_reviews.title: Check phones diagnostics first before ur setup
top_negative_reviews.text: Phone is not worth it everything seemed ok but the hardware to the iPhone I purchased was not ok. I connected my e sim and it disconnects because the hardware need to be replaced or something. I also tried every  method to fix the problem of connecting to cellular.It also came with some scratches already on the phone the sides of the phone are scuffed and the top left  corner is dented in a weird way that it pokes out is hardly noticeable at all until you inspect it !! Now I have to go to my carrier and put my eSIM back on my old phone because this phone caused my e sim to disappear! It's best to buy a pre owned iPhone in person than online because you can see if the phone is ok with everything!

top_positive_reviews.title: Like New but way less
top_positive_reviews.text:
Purchased iPhone 13 used in like new condition from Walmart online.
It was just as described. Everything works great on it. Couldn't be happier, especially for the price. 
Took forever to decide which one I  wanted as there are way more pretty colors since I bought my old iPhone XR.

top_reviews.title: Like New but way less
top_reviews.text:
Purchased iPhone 13 used in like new condition from Walmart online.
It was just as described. Everything works great on it. Couldn't be happier, especially for the price. 
Took forever to decide which one I  wanted as there are way more pretty colors since I bought my old iPhone XR.

top_reviews.title: the phone is superb!
top_reviews.text: the phone itself is absolutely pristine condition!  i was expecting a minor scratch here or there and this device looks out of the box new. Now i ordered my phones unlocked so that i can easily transfer my xfinity mobile service over, as well as my daughters, and for some reason it shows up as still locked when xfinity tried activating. But when we look up the imei all that it clearly says unlocked not black listed has been paid in full . I ended up trying to just put my old sim into the new phone and so far it has worked! So i'm not sure what xfinity meant. However so far so good as far as quality carrier

top_reviews.title: 2nd Time's The Charm
top_reviews.text: I ordered an iPhone 13 mini from Amazon (sold by Woot). The first one had a noticeable screen replacement so I returned it. The second one I ordered looked brand new (condition was refurb-excellent). Battery 100%, no aftermarket battery warning either. I am very pleased with the device!

top_reviews.title: Phone looks brand new
top_reviews.text: Omg, I'm so in love with this phone. I wasn't expecting it to look this good. I bought it for my niece as a gift and I am definitely gonna buy one for myself since it looks so good. I also got an ear phone and a charger with it. Thank you guys for selling quality products for ppl like myself who can't afford to buy brand new ones.

top_reviews.title: Not updated
top_reviews.text: I couldn't transfer my info by placing the phones next to each other bc the new phone wouldn't update. So I went through the cloud. It took a long time and none of the apps transferred. I'm putting all the apps on it, but ok so far. The volume isn't as loud as my other iPhone but I'll adjust. Otherwise it seems to be a good phone.

top_reviews.title: iPhone 12
top_reviews.text: I ordered a refurbished “like new” iPhone 12 for my grandmother. The overall functionality is fine however there were quite a few cosmetic imperfections that I was not satisfied with. The main issue being deep scratches on the screen and around the camera. I installed a glass screen protector along with a case to stop further damage to the iPhone 12. So far it doesn't seem to be an issue but only time will tell.

top_reviews.title: Battery
top_reviews.text: I am disappointed to find the battery capacity of my refurbished iPhone so close to 80%…replacement level.   I opted to get the 13 mini versus the 12 mini because of the marginally better battery life.  It becomes a moot point if the battery needs replacing when I get it!

top_reviews.title: Check phones diagnostics first before ur setup
top_reviews.text: Phone is not worth it everything seemed ok but the hardware to the iPhone I purchased was not ok. I connected my e sim and it disconnects because the hardware need to be replaced or something. I also tried every  method to fix the problem of connecting to cellular.It also came with some scratches already on the phone the sides of the phone are scuffed and the top left  corner is dented in a weird way that it pokes out is hardly noticeable at all until you inspect it !! Now I have to go to my carrier and put my eSIM back on my old phone because this phone caused my e sim to disappear! It's best to buy a pre owned iPhone in person than online because you can see if the phone is ok with everything!

top_negative_reviews.text: had to get a refund. it was supposed to be like new condition.  it came covered in scratches, then 10 days later the screen completely dislodged from the rest of the phone. maybe brush up on what "like new" means.

top_positive_reviews.title: Its good!
top_positive_reviews.text: it came completely perfect, no scratches no nothing. the only complain that i have is it takes long to charge and the maximum capacity is at 84% which isnt that bad but i just wished it would be 100%. but considering its a refurbished phone its super good i recommend!

top_reviews.title: Perfect phone but price kinda iffy
top_reviews.text: I ordered the phone an the shipping was quick, besides fed exes side where they held my package for 5 extra days cause they wanted a signature with a 9am- 8pm time frame of the day with no estimated drop off. Also fed ex had shipped the package to the town next to me,around 30 min there an 30 back without time waiting in line.  Package was flawless tho the phone came in 100% clean condition. Works perfect battery seems to hold up the best out of all past phones. Rate it a 10/10 but keep an eye out on fed ex drop off

top_reviews.title: Great purchase
top_reviews.text: Refurbished IPhone 13 arrived well packaged and included charging block, cable, and SIM ejection tool. The phone had no noticeable damage or dents on the body and the screen had vey minimal scratches (3 tiny ones) that I noticed. The screen also came with a pre-applied screen protector. The phone was fully unlocked and I was able to get on the TMobile network with my existing SIM card. Battery health was at 89%. To be honest, I was expecting the phone to be in worse shape. I’m beyond satisfied with my purchase.

top_reviews.title: Great Experience
top_reviews.text: Very fast shipping.  Phone was in described condition and better than expected.  Very good experience with this seller.

top_reviews.title: Skeptical but Very Satisfied
top_reviews.text: I was skeptical on a refurbished phone but practically a new phone but saved money versus a new one. Screen was and good shape and back in great shape . Battery Life was 86%

top_reviews.title: Its good!
top_reviews.text: it came completely perfect, no scratches no nothing. the only complain that i have is it takes long to charge and the maximum capacity is at 84% which isnt that bad but i just wished it would be 100%. but considering its a refurbished phone its super good i recommend!

top_reviews.title: Still deciding
top_reviews.text: Not fully sold on the iPhone, yet I will update when I make a decision.  The battery has been quite a surprise works well.  Issue is with the speed that it processes at.

top_reviews.title: Decent Quality
top_reviews.text: I know that this is a refurbed/restored phone but I did expect the glass to come free of imperfections. this did have some scratches on the glass already, and nicks in the aluminum frame. just remember you're buying a refurbed phone not a new one so quality or condition of the phone may vary

had to get a refund. it was supposed to be like new condition.  it came covered in scratches, then 10 days later the screen completely dislodged from the rest of the phone. maybe brush up on what "like new" means.

top_reviews.title: Ordered and received 2 unusable phones
top_reviews.text: Couldn’t use either phone.  Neither would update iOS so couldn’t finish setup.  One wouldn’t charge and had a large, very noticeable scratch across the screen.  The other looked like part of the casing had been broken near the screen and just bent back together.  I wouldn’t have cared about the casing as a phone case would cover up the defect, but I was very disappointed with this purchase.  This was my first time buying refurbished, but it might also be my last.  It will definitely be the last time I order from this company.  Spend your money elsewhere.

top_reviews.title: I haven’t still received the item.
top_reviews.text: I don’t know how you send my order b/c my address has locking box. And this time hasn’t first time I didn’t receive my order. So I need my refund as soon as possible
